nothing either action person may deseruedly recommend luys attentiuely gaue eare wellcomposed word painted speech vvhich faire colour vvere layd vvas vvise discreet gentleman therefore suffer dwell vvhere men placed gaue onely passage imagination leauing roome empty receiue reason defendant left doore open vvould meanes giue way haue eares stopped albeit vvere somewhat offended vvith occasion scandall many thing cast mind still farther hee went farther vvas truth trouble suspicion gardiner vvas moore vvho cunningly come thither steale away daraxa perswading himselfe vnderstanding vvas presently blinded therewith ill considered many time nay part execution aduice scarce gone doores repentance presently enters house vpon surmise resolued take hold clappe fast ozmin vvithout resistance show sorrow alteration countenance submitted himselfe shut vp hall fittest place suddennesse surprise could afford present leauing thus vnder locke key made towards daraxa hurrie tumult minister seruants house knew already past hauing beene dayes muttring matter house shewed selfe much agrieued luys manner proceeding forming complaint put doubt goodnesse vnspotted innocencie life setting gate wide open suspicion blurre vvhich giuen reputation euery one might thinke listed fancie stand affected censure honour accordingly suspicion bad whereunto vnaduised act opened gap entrance vvellordered reason deliuered affection mind freenesse spirit made luys quickly repent himselfe done wisht heart daraxa thus newly molded neuer attempted thing angry himselfe much incensed vvho put head might shew lightnesse thus misled ouerfacile wrought vpon men perswasions hee done done vpon good consideration weightinesse businesse required dissembling sorrow spake thus vnto deare daraxa acknowledge wrong haue done ingeniously confesse complaint without iust cause proceeded vnciuill fashion without hauing first examined witness full haue deposed seeme thus wrongfully ignorant owne woorth likewise parent ancestor descended know merit owne proper person haue purchased king master noble queene loue true onely heyre gaine louing tender parent hauing conferred vpon many prodigall publike fauours must giue vnderstand placed house end might serued therein care diligence according pleasure bound giue account thereof according trust reposed reason seruice deserueth hand ought correspond may vnlike selfe faire carriage due vnto loyalty consideration thing question neither conceiue bee thing may seeme vnbefitting breeding giue least blemish honour great familiaritie hold vvith ambrosio name ozmin put vpon himselfe first entred serue daylabourer together talking vnto arabike tongue hath somewhat troubled generall desire heere haue vnderstand manner man fellow first beginning neither selfe hauing seene knowne heretofore satisfied shall rid others doubt selfe impertinent tedious trouble beseech worthy resolue v scruple assuring selfe mine owne part much lyeth shall euer bee ready serue vpon occasion shall offer themselues wherein may seruiceable vnto daraxa stood curiously attentiue luys deliuered might able make answere vnto albeit good vnderstanding already preuented reason case thing beene discouered short tearme time bethinke selfe laying former thought aside driuen make vse materiall proposition made vnto wherewith easily leauing well satisfied shee freed care making good vse bee vvary hereafter shee might inioy selfe shee wont vvith beloued therewithall thus said vnto lord father may truely call lord power father tender care haue ill correspond obligation whereunto bound continuall fauours receiue maiesties meanes intercession dayly augmented fauour deposite cabinet discretion greatest secret sheltring vvith shadow gouerning selfe wisedome truth plainenesse fulfill iust desire albeit recall thing remembrance may forbeare recite vnto cannot great griefe vnto euen matter small martyrdome yet repay kindnesse make become debtor sorrowes giue assurance thereby much esteeme loue sir haue already vnderstoood notorious world misfortune good hap till fruit wax ripe seeing end many trouble condemne one commend brought house euen time marriage treaty gentleman best worth ranke granada neere kinsman king anciently descended husband may stile bred vp sixe seuen yeeres age another child captiue christian much yeeres parent bought seruice entertainment euer went together plaid together eate together vsually slept together great loue betweene see whether pledge friendship haue repeated vnto well husband loue hee beene equall neerest kinsman could haue loud better hee trusted person valiant feoffie pleasure companion entertainment treasury secret substance second selfe conclusion thing like nothing difference religion whereof greatnesse discretion neuer argued might disbrother themselues brother world could loue better well captiue deserue loue spake amisse word brother better befits haue calld faithfull carriage composed behauiour gentlemanlike proceeding somuch knowne haue beene borne meane parent got liuing handylabour poore cottage captiuated made slaues time verily haue beleeud descended noble bloud generous offspring honest man say honourable vertue deserues stile messenger entertainment post ranne betweene vs▪ faithfull hee onely man wholly imployed businesse brought letter present returning back due requital like case vsually passe betwixt truely loue baça deliuered vp found hee set liberty together rest captiues time within citie able say whether ioy recouer freedome sorrow forsake v greater himselfe best tell also whatsoeuer else shall desire know besides please aske hard matter doe man speake ambrosio seruice god come hither comfort vnto affliction lost euer thought least looked found againe ranne ouer whole course misfortune since first time graduated tooke degree vvith cherish hope aduerse fortune entertaining painefull life deceiue wearisomnesse alingring tedious time comfort fauour shall offend follow owne mine shall euer subordinate may dispose pleasure luys strooken astonishment tendernesse well strangenesse pittifulnesse story besides much mooued manner proceeding went discourse without pausing perturbation accident whereby hee might coniecture made tale inuention owne vpon present carriage credit better letting fall eye effectuall teares able soften hard marble rent sunder rocky diamond speech ambrosio loosed prison without questioned thing might wrong report vvhich daraxa giuen onely laying arme neck looking cheerefully vpon told know ambrosio thou hast noble bloud thee though wanting vnto thee thou art able giue thy selfe thine owne vertue noblenesse haue lately heard thee obliged henceforth vse thee fairenesse thy worth deserueth ozmin told sir shall doe like selfe good shall receiue shall euer make glory came largenesse hand noble house past permitted return againe vnto garden familiaritie much licence freenesse liberty talked together often would themselues without scandall interim king queene still care know daraxa well state health otherwise whereof particular aduice giuen time time glad heare welldoing continually letter recommend dearely care luys expresse charge vse kindnesse fauour wrought much well desire stand grace maiesties daraxa owne desert onely rodrigo principall caualleros citie wished heart christian might make loue vnto pretending take wife rodrigo hath said custody common opinion world amongst riualls thought fauoured case cleere suspition without great likelihood qualitie condition behauiour faire proceeding good tryall ostentation nature apparences commendable part wont slightest moment lowest round ladder climbes vnto honour man shall haue made publike demonstration vertues noble carriage presumed lesse beloued knowne get aduantage shall come matter opposition shall vndervalued opinion louers exchanged soules none possessed owne firme louing farre offending daraxa neuer gaue way discomposture vnioynted behauiour occasion whatsoeuer whereby one might presume vpon fauour howbeit adored left meanes vnsought procure loue net vnspred seeking traines draw within reach none ground whereupon build hope rodrigo perceiuing little seruices auaile labour vaine small remedy hee found since many dayes spent continuall conuersation remained state first day neither better worse ought hee knew came consideration make vse ozmin thinking intercession get fauour taking best surest way worke end one morning garden hee brake thus friend ambrosio thou canst know obligation thou hast thy religion thy king thy country bread thou eatest father desire haue thy good conceiue christian quality thy workes doe publish thou wilt correspond thou professest thy selfe come thee moued thereunto great necessitie offer selfe vnto whereupon doth depend increase mine honour safety life wholly lye thy hand discoursing daraxa amongst reason thou shalt worke force argument forsake false sect wherewith infected make become christian thou canst see good come thereof first saluation owne soule next good seruice vnto god thirdly great content catholike maiesties fourthly honour thy selfe thy countrey lastly selfe perfect happinesse desiring wife meane married vnto benefit shall small vvhich thou shalt make voyage shall profitable shall honourable vnto thee therefore straine wit thou hast bring good purpose passe besides thou shalt bee rewarded god soule thou shalt gaine part many requital reall recompence life thou shalt giue mee thy good diligence businesse exercising thy power shall good hap winne thy intercession doe refuse doe mee fauour since thou canst doe much many tyes vpon thee induce thee hereunto fit presse thee importunate thee hee ended exhortation ozmin made answere good lord reason wherewith seeke binde ought likewise oblige beleeue much desire daraxa follow religion earnestly diuers nay infinit time haue perswaded vnto desire therefore vse diligence particular cause thing wherein much interessed louing betrothed friend master dearely treat turne christian double passion without fruit hath hope yet aliue fortune may turne wheele againe flattering selfe accident whereby time may come inioy desire yet learne shee still harping vpon string ought perceiue constant conceit may comply command shall though sure labour fruitlesse returne treat kinde haue done acquaint answere moore lye one word said rightly vnderstood thinking thing remote rodrigo gaue credit truely formally deliuered though deceiued confidence cleane hope quien de veras ama seenganna con desengannos hee truely loues deceiud ought disdeceiue ozmin rodrigo gone remained sad see open instance made owne hurt ready iealousie runne wit afflict day forward could neuer get cheerefull looke making thing impossible seeme possible vnto hee wrastle struggle himselfe imagining new competitor powerfull owne house country might vse trick deuices wherewith hinder intent sollicitous earnest businesse feared againe side lest might wrought alter former affection many battery make breach strongest walles secret mynes blowne vp laid leuell ground iealousie hee discoursed thought tragicall end disastrous accident presented themselues vnto phantasie much beleeue mightily feare hee perfect louer daraxa seeing dearest beloued many dayes together continued melancholy mood desirous know cause sadnesse could wring speake word vnto vvhich past betwixt rodrigo shee poore gentlewoman knew vvhich way vvorke bee merry howbeit sweet word vttered daintier tongue pleasant smile constant heart much augmented faire eye whose warme teares bedew tender cheek cristall water slow softly breathed foorth hauing first sent foorth many sigh herald sorrowfull mind word vnto lord life liberty betroathed vvhom honour obay thing force aliue presence thus hurt torment grieue may life peraduenture price ioy vvill pleased dispose whereby soule may freed hell sorrow vvherein sake tormented let chearefull heauen countenance scatter cloud vvherewith heart ouercast able doe thing loue beare deserueth ought griefe wherein may moue pity life receiue buriall secrecie beseech tell cause sadnesse stopt teares choakt vtterance sorrow working one effect could answer otherwise scalding teares loue striuing owne dry vp others seeming bee one selfesame thing long tongue thus tyed current speach stopped ozmin oppression sighes closely smoothered fearing vent ouerheard long resist returning backe againe vnto soule whence would haue broken way fell downe swoune deepe one lay dead daraxa knew fetch againe way comfort could conceiue might cause great sudden alteration hauing formerly beene accustomed shew himselfe merry cheerefull shee busie wiping face drying eye putting faire hand vpon dipt rich handkerchiefe water imbroydered gold siluer interwouen diuers glorious colour scattered pearle deuices wonderfull worth workmanship much transformed paine sens wholly taken vp seeking recouer fit continued little longer rodrigo might haue found little lesse arme arme daraxa head leaning knee one side body folded gowne first began come himselfe sens come againe proper place well thinking haue taken leaue rodrigo nicke come garden daraxa though much troubled came handsomely could leauing haste curious handkerchiefe ground quickly taken vp ozmin presently eye saw rodrigo drew nigh went way left two alone together rodrigo saw coast cleare askt done busines told time found firme loue betrothed friend onely wonne pretend christian shee yet sake would willingly turne moore extreame owne folly loue religion husband treated businesse attempt propose beareth v hatred resolued euer speake word thereof againe neuer see see sooner saw vvent way would haue vveary selfe suit spend time see vvill vaine hopelesse piece vvorke rodrigo strucken deeply dumpes vvith resolute answer deliuered vvith sharpnesse vvhich made sowre vnfit rellish time forward began suspect ozmin vvas rather preiudice profit rather disaduantage aduance pretension howsoeuer thought least himselfe though daraxa might haply haue giuen distastfull reply yet ill become report vnto rough fashion making himselfe master ruler roste impossible thing incounter loue discretion euermore man much confounded troubled himselfe much hee loueth affecteth hereupon represent selfe vnto strict league amity friendship daraxa reported haue beene betwixt old master imagined loue still aliue could perswaded ash fire yet growne cold conceit reinforced passion fully bent put house informing father vnfitting nay dangerous permit daraxa one might intertaine discourse former loue still putting mind thereof especially maiesties intent purpose haue turne christian would hard long ambrosio let v sir sayd make triall sundring dayes one another shall see effect bring foorth luys whit mislike sonnes councell presently picking quarrell cause great men must aske reason thing captaine souldiers bee bold make fifteene two •… ights dismissed seruice commanding much dare passe doore hee tooke sudden could take leaue daraxa obaying master faining lesse sorrow felt remoued body thence pledge could carry whither listed soule abode still whose power formerly long remained argvment continuing story loue ozmin daraxa recounted trouble griefes befell also publike feast made diuers knight gentleman glad cheare vp disconsolate daraxa valour ozmin disguise vnknowe performe daraxa seeing sudden change began suspect former sorrow birth new successe sequele assured selfe whereupon adding one euill another sorrow sorrow griefe griefe wanting sight espoused lord albeit poore lady dissemble shee could yet trouble giue leaue weepe howle sigh cry talke find themselues afflicted albeit doe therewith take away burthen paine indure yet doth lessen sorrow make load somewhat lighter depriued content heauily sad bodily afflicted might read griefes onely face countenance throughout course carriage inamoured moore would change estate condition life went clad stile still continued habit daylabourer followed painefull fortune therein hee good successe hoped like aduantage daily followed worke hard ought got going sort place place proue fortune trying meanes could come heare hearken thing might import serue turne concerning daraxa end interest world labour hard liberally spend large hand many dayes together meanes brought home money iewels well vvhich hath beene sayd also hee vvas well knowne habit might haue freer licence wheresoeuer came himselfe remaine safe person vnder disguise lest designes might otherwise ouerthrowne continued wonted weare young canalleros serued daraxa knowing fauour bare ozmin longer seruant luys house euery one couet himselfe owne end happy vvas could make first purchase generall desire haue alonso de cuniga got start rest gentleman city one borne great estate young gallant rich one confident others want wealth helpe ambrosio carry businesse commanded sent intertained seruice many knowne good turnes made aduantageous proffer gaue many kind louing word conclusion kind friendship begun betweene thing may found betweene master man notwithstanding inasmuch man compatible commonly called •… ame priuancie inwardnesse vvhereinto men grow deseruing seruice vvith hauing runne ouer passage came end discouer desire vnto promising great reward •… ut opening vnto old wound ripping vp sore make greater ielous one two corriuals vvithin short time knew many master discouered vnto way marched meanes whereby thought preuaile owne part neither sought desired furtherance others saue onely good intelligence beleeuing verily perswaded himselfe solely intercession bee sufficient effect able imagine much lesse expresse griefe vvhich hee conceiued seeing himselfe second time made bawd owne wife fitting notwithstanding past▪ thorow pike discreet kind dissimulation intertained good word feare lest might happen vnto rodrigo carry himselfe violently inconsideratly rest deale finde hand full giue himselfe great deale trouble end lose come knowledge thing concerning bestbeloued peaceably inioy end desire must put patience sufferance atchieuement bore fayrely hand albeit heart fire various thought gaue many shrewd battell assaulted euery side galling cruell manner like bull inraged knew helpe himselfe whither fly succour behind vvhom runne could find comfort ease intolerable torment indured hare single grayhounds many lightfooted certaine falcon fauour high place would refuse stoope lure hope reward may adde number shefriends acquaintance comming visit banquet daraxa vsually set fire honour many faire lady blow coales lust many noble house good report honest fame many lady gentlewoman enter appearance forsooth vnder faire name uisites difficulty find home owne house effect purpose others worke deceite bring innocent dame one deuice net wherein themselues haue beene caught kind creature great store world full practice common nay principallest grauest sort lady diuel hath beene carelesse working become potlids couers boyling vessel concupiscence siluer plate couer many sweet morsell gallant eagerly long licke lippes sharpe set thing hee feare many rodrigo himselfe rest riuals bare great hatred false arrogancie vvhereof hee cunningly made vse haue thereby desist purpose daunt amate hee made beleeue least would faine haue thinke onely man like carry daraxa hauing best meanes opportunity besides owne desire grow loue fauour hereupon spake courteously vnto heart wisht hangd powred hony mouthes leauing rancour poyson brest saluted kindly curst bowel intrailes desiring see burst thousand piece smiled vpon dogges doe grin waspes longd haue snap common fashion court particularly amongst greatest ranke quality let v returne againe daraxa speake torment suffered care tooke know become dearest loue whither gone health spent time whether got new mistresse trouble albeit mother haue likewise sorrow absence child yet notwithstanding case alike onely feare life child wife losse husband loue lest woman fawning blandishment smooth flattery draw affection dayes sad night tedious woman weaue vnweaue thought like penelope web chaste desire beloued ulysses shall vtter much silent passage nature paint foorth sorrow small cunning famous painter vsed vpon death young damosell hee painted dead stretcht life lying coffin hee placed round coarse parent brother kinsfolkes friend acquaintance houshold seruants proper place griefe fitting euery one seuerall degree came father mother left finish face giuing euery one licence free libertie pourtrayt foorth sorrow according himselfe affected neither word pensill way able manifest parent loue sorrow conceiued saue onely action wee haue read heathen people course must take pensill rude tongue shall bee grosse vnhewen sticke fit onely forme blot blurres therefore shall bee wisedome leaue discretion hearer shall vnderstand history referre consideration manner passion apprehended euery man may measure owne imagination iudging others heart owne daraxa surchargd sorrow outward remonstrance manifested inward affliction luys seeing wholly taken vp melancholly also rodrigo sonne cheere vp ordained certaine feast running buls juego de canna city well fitted pastime shortly tooke effect actor sport euery one seuerall deuice wrought different sort silkes colour expressing therein diuers passion one despaire another hope captiuity iealousie ioy sorrow loue like meet poore daraxa soone ozmin knew appointed feast bee performed master one number thought himselfe time ill spent see mistris giuing proofe valour setting himselfe forth day amongst rest come iust buls began rune mounted vpon horse euery point well fitted face scarfed watchet taffata might auoid common eye horse eye vayled bend blacke feigned himselfe stranger seruant went bearing hand goodly strong launce rounded whole place beholding many thing admiration therein aboue beauty daraxa outshine rest day doth night presence dame darknesse placed himselfe right ouer window whither sooner come hee saw place much altered euery man flying fast could fierce bull instant let paddock bull tarifa well growne cunning carriage head stout lyon full rage sooner let forth giuing two three nimble bound put himselfe midst place making himselfe master round great affright terrour hee turnd frizzled front side side whilest diuers dart throwne easily shake vsed art hee would suffer gall flanke inferiour part hee auoid vsing certaine light friskals performed dexterously could touch man place durst incounter horsebacke afoot durst expect comming looke face though neuer farre feare left alone one man saue onely ozmin seruant seene thing neere circuit ground bull rode wing winde ranne speed could directly towards gentleman hee forced betake himselfe suddenly launce taken hand bull first let loose lifting vp right arme bearing launce best aduantage whereat fastened daraxas handkerchiefe left behind garden haue heard heretofore gracefull kinde actiuenesse gallant ayme carriage arme charged home vpon making way necke hee ranne launce quite body made stay till point thereof nayled hoofe one farther feete ground leauing dead without motion world onely remaining hand short broken truncheon launce hee casting away carelesse fashion victoriously modestly quitted place daraxa much reioyced sight first made entrance knew man sometimes also seruant likewise handkercher bull slaine wore arme present generall murmure remained full admiration giuing due commendation clearing happinesse stroke strength vnknowne knight thing else mouthes multitude discoursing braue performance businesse deliuering manner thereof one another though seene yet euery one spake thereof afresh seemed dreame wonder clapping hand others highly extolling valour one speakes finger another stand amazed third blesses himselfe fourth lift vp arme fifth act hand hauing mouthes eye full ioy sixt bowes downe body suddenly leapes vp againe ayre bend browe ready burst content make gracefull matachines many pretty antikegestures daraxa seemed many degree glory▪ ozmin withdrew himselfe citie certaine backgardens formerly came leauing horse changing cloathes vvith sword vnder arme returning habit ambrosio came place taking stand might see hee desired seene againe loud owne life tooke great pleasure beholding howbeit daraxa fearefull lest misfortune might befall standing afoot amongst multitude made signes vnto get vp vpon scaffold made show vnderstand meaning standing still till buls began runne time euening farre spent approaching night sport juego de canna made entrance manner following first trumpet fife drum accompanied diuers sort musicke presented themselues cladde rich liueries sundry colour followed azemilas sumpter mule laden bundle cane company maintaine sport likewise eight answering number bundle cane euery one sumpter cloth veluet cast ouer cane richly imbroydered armes master silke gold garrote belonging thereunto siluer entred two hundred forty gennets richly furnished 48 knight fiue piece euery man besides came cane made vp fixe whole entred first right hand came two file opposing themselues aduerse part first two horse beene yoaked together ranne euen equall course assisted fiue others side bearing owner target arson saddle offering fairest show eye spectator wherein depainted emblemes motto set forth faire scarfes rich ribbonings tassel button best silke gold sundry borderings costly imbroyderies euery man suting himselfe according humour particular fancy horse pettrels stucke full bel furniture trapping rich curious sumptuous headstals gold siluer set precious stone thicke could stand shall suffice better amplifying haue spoken seuill small store make little esteeme thing knight gentleman louers competitor rich young lady stroue present amongst entred one gate place giuen round issued another neere vnto entred one hinder either comming going forth thus past good equipage could desired horse hauing quit place gallant entred againe whole eight squadron running two two together well attired themselues liueries attending vpon hath deliuered launce hand strongly brandishing made stock point thereof seeme meet together whose nimble shaking caused euery single launce appeare foure presently vpon incouraging proud gennet lowd shoutes cryes wounding sattin side sharpe spurres would haue thought rather fly runne master seeming one ioyntbody closely keepe themselues seates hyperbole ouerindearing done since part almost andaluzia seuill cordóua xerez de la frontera bring forth child commonly said cradle saddle part accustome carry cane wonder tender yeeres see hard steele dexterity agility body doe thing ordinary exercise amongst gaue turne place running fro foure part thereof leauing place recouer fresh breath giue pawsing spectator entred againe changing still horse target armes cane hand diuided themselues sixe sixe manner handsome wellordered fashion began sport wherein hauing continued space quarter houre thereabouts gentleman thrust amongst part quarrell beginning fresh horse wellprepared skirmish one part place ranging marshalling themselues good array obseruing due time measure seemed fine contriued daunce beholding whereof held people suspence possessing faculty giue singular content sport interrupted wholly disordered sudden approach furious bull let loose side place vvere horsebacke changing cane iauelins ready hand began cast themselues ring seeking shut euery side bull stood stocke still midst knowing first set vpon cast eye vpon tearing vp earth forked foot whilest euery man stood manner expecting chance one bold rogue amongst rest come athwart prouoking fury tottered cloake shrill shoutes little needed instigation bull presently thereupon like one mad rage forsaking horseman made eagernesse could tooke himselfe heeles fast able carry flyes bull bull neuer giues ouer forcing take sanctuary vnder daraxas window iust ozmin stood deeming place priuiledge fearefull young fellow reputing kinde iniury offered lady mistris receiue ill entertainment likewise himselfe poore rogue suffer comming thither well respect also incensed stroue get honour day winne grace something brauely presence breaking thickest people went bull forsaking formerly followed made directly towards himselfe beheld thought either foolish mad desperately put himselfe forth incounter beast courage fiercenesse looking euery minute take vp betweene horne tossing vp aloft breake euery bone piece lowd voice cride vnto take heed passion god loue life looke selfe thousand liues danger losing may time imagine selues poore taking spouse mine owne part know say therein saue woman bereft proper soule become insensible body much sence bull bowed downe head fasten blowe vpon humbling himselfe sacrifice neuer came lift vp againe moore wrything body aside extraordinary quicknesse vnsheathing sword acting instant gaue cut neck close vnto horne parting bone braine funder hee left head hanging windepipe lay dead done though done nothing sheathing sword presently leaues place common rout loue nouelties hunger well heare tell strange tale besides many horseman footman began flock know pressed hard euery side see throngd behind almost stiffled scarce able wagge amongst windowes scaffold began new murmure admiration like vnto former generall ioy amongst thing hapned conclusion feast nothing else talked saue onely two wonderfull accident euening doubting greater two taking good part second course set hee left palate well pleased mouthes seasoned good rellish recommend braue action perpetuall remembrance succeeding age argvment story continues two illustrious louers ozmin daraxa wherein declared sorrow griefe diuers accident comfort cheere vp daraxa tourneyment iusting performed many knight gentleman worth wherein ozmin bore away bell glory day yet could make daraxa merry day daraxa haue seene pleasure interrupted ioyes intermixed griefes delight false content vnsauoury scarce arriued comfort tooke seeing desired sudden ouertaken feare danger likewise torment thinke selfe knew vpon occasion see againe might feed fill satisfying hunger eye delicate food sweet desire pleasure appeares sorrow place could discerned countenance whether feast giuen contentment intended well gallant somewhat heated beeing set fire beautifull fayrenesse fayre beauty daraxa desirous euer entertayne pleasure fitting occasion might offered come againe sight pride heart heat blood ordayned tourney wherein rodrigo challenger night challenge publisht great store musicall instrument brightburning torch streetes together great place seemed flame solemne manner set vp challenge might best seene read passed place tourneyment neere vnto gate call gate cordoua adioyning wall haue sometimes seene well knowne though decayed knight gentleman went exercise armes proue lance alonso de zunniga new beginner likewise practise amongst rest desirous shew himselfe tourney great affection hee bare daraxa afraid rather lose get honour tourneyment sticke company publikely say much wanted eyther strength courage thing whatsoeuer vse make mastery haue onely bare theoricke naked speculation thing neuer skilfull contemplatiue knowledge erre ayme neuer confident vndertakings vnwilling erre thought whereof much afflict yet made withall carefull behaue himselfe businesse ozmin side desired haue enemy hee could might tourney thought possible admitted number would faine haue somebody enter list might ouerthrow rodrigos pride ielous rest effect purpose mind therein master seruice spake thus vnto sir pleased grant free liberty speech may haply deliuer vnto may profit vnto honourable occasion alonso dreaming nothing lesse vvould treat touching gentlemanlike exercise rather supposing would entertaine discourse touching loue sayd vnto slow vnfolding selfe considering haste haue heare thee longing desire haue know thou wilt say vnto sir quoth find force must bee present famous tourneyment noyse whereof hath filled euery man eare talke wonder reward glorious name lye stake men go fearefully great desire haue gaine poore creature doe best seruice instructing enabling vvhich desirous attayne vnto exercise horsemanship vse armes short time way doubting instruction shall bring foorth good fruit promise let seeme strange vnto let youth scandall skill must tell beeing thing whereunto haue euen beene bred familiar vnto mee dare boldly boast knowledge alonso much ioyed hearing giuing many thankes voluntary offer loue seruice told thou performest thou speakest thou shalt bind much vnto thee ozmin made answere promiseth cannot performe wide word worke meanes nothing deceit stand tearmes doe trickes cannot serue turne must force vnlesse bee foole accomplish deed promiseth vvords take order sir armes prouided owne person mine shall quickly know much slower haue beene offer much sooner bring effect freeing selfe debt obligation haue serue alonso presently gaue order haue thing necessary prouided vvere fitted purpose went foorth place part day followed till determined time tourneying spent time exercise solemne feast required short time alonso learnd keepe seate sure hee beene lockt saddle bearing lance gracefull carriage cowching wrest comely diportment many yeeres beene practised feates armes vvhereupon vvere good helpes cleane proportion body accompanied smart nymble kinde strength gaue small gracefull successe performance dexterity vaulting horse passing lightly one saddle another direction teaching shape proportion fashion body behauiour besides garbe ozmins language alonço began thinke himselfe impossible man name ambrosio much lesse labourer vnlesse perhaps laboured wretched fortune whereof hee seemed make shew discouered action liuely splendour principall person nobly descended various successe fortune wandred vp downe disguise able contayne himselfe quiet till rid doubt taking one day aside hee spake thus secret vnto ambrosio long haue serued short time haue beene haue bound much vnto vertues noble kind carriage speake therefore vayne seeke longer conceale selfe vnder course vayle base vile clothes vnder poore habit thou wearest lye hid nobler office nobler name like iewels lapt vp leathercases know manifest signes haue noted obserued thee thou doest speake properly hast deceiued poore labourer whose person willing represent generall especially young kind knowledge particularly exercise armes horsemanship thing almost let call word againe say beyond beliefe haue seene thee plainely perceyued vnder hard clod earth muddy shels inclosed finest gold purest orientall pearles vvorld afford already well knowne vnto thee thou art yet seeke howbeit say cause knowne effect thou canst longer conceale thy selfe sweare vnto thee faith haue iesus christ order knighthood professe maintaine thy faithfull secret friend keeping vnder locke silence thou shalt deposite bosome assisting thee able purse person giue mee account thy fortune may sort cancell debt wherein stand bound vnto thee reall courtesy vvhich haue receiued thee hereunto ozmin thus replyde strongly sir haue coniurd squizd grape vvinepresse must force wring soule strayning world saue press gentlemanlike proceeding impossible drawne complying therefore cōmand putting assured confidence well person promise shall giue vnderstand gentleman natiue soyle saragoça aragon name iayme uiues borrowed father likewise vvas called many yeres since following occasion nature youngmen bee action fell moore hand made slaue subtill kind trechery false play certaine fained friend whether occasioned enuy misfortune large tale tell shall suffice deliuer vnto power sold renegado one renounced christianity vse inough haue namd condition led along till brought granada gentleman bought mee called zegri one principallest person city man sonne yeeres selfe vvhose name ozmin picture selfe well age stature feature fauour condition thing else whatsoeuer truly resemble desirous buy vse better might breed greater fastnesse friendship betweene v taught could knew according selfe learned friend home mine owne country perfected mee frequent practice like exercise common vse v nothing whence reaped small benefit conuersing master sonne knowledge thereby increased otherwise might haply haue forgot experience teacheth v men teaching come learne hence grew refined sonne father affection bore vnto trusting person wealth much rely vpon truth honesty young gentleman suitour daraxa daughter alcalde de baça mistresse much adore marriage treated vpon point take effect article agreement already drawne doubt match ere beene concluded warres hindred present siege layd vnto wherby forced deferre till fitter time baça shortly yeelded vp occasion whereof intended marriage hung suspence dominus factotum onely man fauour trust went came present interchangeable kindness one city good fortune baça time rendred vp recouered liberty together many captiues would faine haue returned home mine owne countrey wanted money end notice kinsman mine abiding city two thing concurre draw hither desire see place noble magnificent city supplying want better performe iourney continued great without finding sought hearing newes vncertaine turned vtter vndoing finding seeke case commonly falleth vvent wandring vp downe city hauing little money much care happe meete rare piece nature admirable beauty least eye howsoeuer might otherwise thats one beeing onely faire pleaseth deliuered vp faculty leauing selfe one liue made reckoning selfe possessed thing faire workmanship donna elvira sister rodrigo daughter luys de padilla old master counsell saying springeth necessity seeing selfe wholly lost loue finding meanes manifest affection together quality person held best course write letter vnto father recouery liberty indebted thousand double ducat would pleased supply much money reliefe businesse succeeded well hauing sent whole summe seruant horse iourney put selfe good cloathes fitted selfe thing necessary according mine owne mind two three first dayes began make street walke giuing many turne howers day could neuer haue happinesse see continuall walking way began suspicious people obserued seemed haue watchfull eye ouer wherefore auoyding spyes withdrew selfe wonted walke betooke selfe retired course life seruant imparted louebusinesses thinking vpon course aduised beeing elder better experienced selfe finding certaine piece worke going forward lord house suite selfe like daylabourer change name might knowne ranke selfe amongst rest hired digge carry away rubbish mason worke began consider selfe might happen thereupon loue ouer come difficulty death weake aduersary withstand force feare layd aside euery thing seemed easie vnto put resolution entertaine aduice accordingly time befell mee vnexpected accident vvhich worke finished receiud house gardiner neuer till happy day long looked moone come full climing height good fortune first day supplyde place newly set foot within garden luckily met daraxa wondred see lesse behold gaue account liues relating mutuall misfortune recounting mine sticking tell farre loue friend fast fetter held heart intreating withall since shee cleare knowledge parent selfe nobly descended would bee pleased fauour pretension worke good intercession might come holy rite marriage enioy fruit hope promised would assure selfe lay accomplish desire fortune euermore niggardlyhanded towards mee tender loues like young plant began gather little strength way shoot vp higher sprig rent bud blasted sharpe easterly wind malicious worme lay gnawing root till last withered nothing quite consumed sudden banished house knowing wherefore falling thus highest top happinesse lowest depth misery stroke launce killd first bull hee edge sword made fall dead foot selfe saw well inough knew little glad plainely reade look eye expresse life occasion possible would likewise striue make notable proofe please mistris shall eternize action giuing world vnderstand valuation ought rated amongst rest inability execute desire make euen ready burst griefe could purchase bloud would willingly let loose sluces veines obtaine wished end thus sir see haue freely laid open vnto whole successe loue haue giuen true account remaining nothing selfe reckoning saue grosse summe disgrace word stopt alonso listned earnestly vnto eares let loose tothers tongue tyde mouth threw armes necke clasping close vnto streight imbracements whilst ozmin meane stroue kisse hand hee would suffer doe saying hand armes bee imployed thy seruice may thereby deserue gaine thine time vse compliment alter yet course haue hitherto held seeing owne disposition doe otherwise tourneyment let neuer trouble thought shall enter rest doubt shall therefore plucke vp spirit set heart rest ozmin made offer kisse hand humbling knee ground alonso like making many proffer preuention forcibly new bond friendship tye thus past large conuersation rest dayes remained till time houre wherein tourneyment performed told rodrigo great arrogancie secretly misliked gallant therefore alonso thought himselfe met desired iayme viues entring tourney wel assured would eclypse honour beat downe pride ozmin part likewise desire much houre arming come might see daraxa enter place walked vp downe wondring see richly adorned hanging cloth gold silke many vnable expressed variety colour curiositie windowes beauty lady richnesse dressing cloathes concourse sort gallant put together seemed one inestimable iewell euery particular selfe precious stone set therein tiltyard diuided place two equall part ranne quite athwart midst conuenient place scaffold set vp iudges right ouer windowes appointed daraxa donna elvira vvho vpon two white palfrey furniture blacke veluet set siluer oes sutably frindged entred well attended rounded place tooke seates ozmin leauing hasted away anon challenger enter within little space made arriuall wonderfull well set foorth good equipage hoboyes trumpet instrument musicke sounded without ceasing till seated place afterwards entred defendant alonso one first hauing performed three course singular well better presently returned home hauing obtained licence caualeere friend hee expected xeres de la frontera ozmin meane attending comming came together place alonso padrino presented vnto moore armes blacke horse sutable without plume helmet instead whereof great curiosity made rose daraxas handkercher assured token whereby might know put himselfe posture good lucke would haue runne first launce one challenger abettor signall giuen made carreere ozmin hit aduersary beuer hee brake launce giuing counterbuffe truncheon staffe remoued saddle fell stroke ground ouer horse crupper harme saue suffered weight armour two last course rodrigo put himselfe forth lighted first launce left arme moore neere vnto shoulder remaining wounded pouldrons right side brake staffe three piece last rodrigo mist ozmin brake neere sight helmet hee left behinde great splinter launce generally thought shrewdly wounded helmet defended well great harme moore hauing broken three launce went way wonderfully ioyed victory much alonso brought champion field could finde place large inough intertaine ioy quitted place went home house disarme himselfe suffering man else see face putting ordinary apparell secretly went posterne doore backside house returning behold deare daraxa see passed tiltyard hee gotten neere vnto mistris might manner haue shaken hand looked steadily euermore bare eye sadly heauy cheere beyond degree sadnesse supposing cause sorrow might cheered gracious cast eye could shee tell thinke much amazed see tilt blacke horse armour signe amongst euill lucke put together wrought deepe melancholly continued extremely passionate therein surcharged sorrow sport scarce ended heart trembling body shee left window hastned home accompany much maruell went away better pleased seeming take contentment done withall began murmure mutter amongst themselues euery one suspecting owne malice suggest vnto luys like wise gentleman oft heard reasoning thereof spake still excuse like sonnes euening found grumbling carriage telling afflicted soule weepes midst mirth thing minister matter ioy gladnes man woman absent best affect good thing much esteemed much inioy knowne person particular acquaintance towards stranger may doubt many intertainments giuen moue pleasure delight ala haue feeling thought otherwise taken vp increase sorrow much much others see greater ioy blame doe thinke thing strange rather imagine haue proceeded great prudence dislike sport doe meerely attribute graue sober behauiour whereas contrary vvould haue argued much lightnesse vnsettled kind carriage imputation woman prize vertue goodnesse study auoid besides farre father mother bestbeloued though free vsage yet captiue condition strange country knowing remedy selfe shall finde meanes let euery man examine owne bosome let make case owne hee tell mee another tale ingenuously confesse finde himselfe affected iust otherwise health bid sicke eate well discourse hauing past secret amongst treated afterwards publike zerezano brauely hee behaud himselfe day albeit desired much know could neuer get alonso told first beleeued true daraxas melancholly increased dayly cause thereof none could guesse aright wide marke none came neere butt shot bolt fell short flew ouer iudge amisse inuenting meane time entertainment wit could deuise giue content haue broken braines study thereof neuer neerer purpose farre capable delight deuised entring within circle desire argvment continuing story noble loues two disconsolate louers recounted luys cheere vp gentle daraxa brought pleasant village whither ozmin repairing set vpon company clownes defence himselfe slewe foure outright wounded many others fact committed prison sentenced death together diuers sundry accident insued thereupon end hee set liberty himselfe daraxa turning christian happy nuptials solemnly celebrated presence king queene spaine lvys house axarafe possession belonging thereunto vert ue mayorasgoship little village appertaining seuill season temperate beeing february time field seeme put new apparell thither agreed goe make merry recreate themselues dayes might leaue path vntroden see meanes could diuert sorrowes shee seemed somewhat pleased made shew better cheerefulnes supposing went forth citie shee finde meanes see speake ozmin made ready recamara fitting prouision businesse good sport behold hurly burly confused noise amongst charge grayhounds goe along setting dog tumbler kennell hound third carried hawkes afield man bearing owle peece shoulder crossebowes hand othersome mule laden bedding hanging housholdstuffe trooping together laughing making themselues merry conceiued ioy feast alonso hauing notice hereof come ozmin tels mistress gone abroad country take ayre disport themselues remaine time would returne againe knew newes nothing displeasing vnto two respect one might happely meet fewer competitor pursuit loues might haue better occasion knowne night neither cleere darke cold hot pleasant noise stilnesse delicate darke clearenesse heaun earth ouerspred heart man could imagine fitter night purpose two louing friend friendly louers agreed try fortune see prize could make choise two rich bottomes laden much honour beauty wealth greatest treasure world afford disguised themselues apparelling body good honest country cloathes like plaine husbandman set forth sunset vpon two hackney iades came neere vnto village quarter league thereabouts alighted certaine farmehouse end marching thus foot lesser notice might taken might haue fell happily fortune wheeled selfe turned back towards arriued good time euen lady balcon intertaining discourse wholly fitting themselues conuersation mirth company occasion giue cause alonso durst draw neere feare frighting game therefore intreated companion make windelase negotiate alone beloued donna eluira well knowne daraxa reason hide himselfe ozmin degree carefull kinde carelesnesse stole neerer neerer singing low base humming betweene teeth arabique song vnderstood language cleere note knew neglectfull thereof seemed ordinary la la la donna elvira hearkening vnto told daraxa euen rude kinde people god hath bestowd gift knew vvell vse doe obserue sauage fellow sweet welltuned voice hath rellisheth ayreth note merrily chant mother brought world pricksong water raines selfe sea without profit see said daraxa thing esteemed according subiect wherein subsist country clownes tender age transplanted political ciuill life remoued changed barren better ground wholly stript rugged bark wherin born thousand one euer come well behaud whereas contrary citizen naturally good disposition like vine continue yeere vndrest vntrimd yeeldeth fruit notwithstanding though little returne prune husband aright acknowledgeth good hath receiued render large thankefull recompence fellow sings heere knotty piece timber arrant clowne best carpenter world cannot axe plainer hewe fashion shaue smoothnesse ciuill carriage euer remaine vnprofitable blocke torment heare turtle sing please let v go hence time withdraw selues may take rest louers well vnderstood one another song word end spake rest lady went way daraxa remained little behind rest speaking arabicke tongue willd stay stood waiting meane walked carelesly vp downe still eye towards window see vvhen make returne baser sort people secret kind instinct euermore beare naturall hatred noble lyzard snake swan eagle cocke francolino phesant crab cuttlefish dolphin whale oyle pitch vine colewort like aske desirous know vvhat naturall cause thereof shew reason adamant drawes vnto yron marygold followes sunne basiliske kill looking swallow▪ wort helpes sight thing naturally loue one another othersome hate abhorre celestiall influence reason whereof mortall men haue day beene able reach vnto thing diuers kind haue property vvonder consist differing composition disposition inclination nature reasonable men tone tother molded one earth one flesh one blood one beginning createdforme selfesame end liuing vnder one selfesame law beeing one religion euery part farrefoorth men one selfesame substance similiancy man naturally loues man yet say contrariety vnsauorie taste raskallity base offscumme earth hard flint gallician nut persecute nobility vehemencie matter great admiration night certaine young lad parish likewise walked abroad lighted chance vpon two stranger first incounter without cause reason world occasion giuen began flocke together gathering themselues ring beganne cry amaine woolfe woolfe woolfe come throwing therewithall little stone handful head showred heauen shrewdly bepelted pate forced flie vnable make longer stay intertainment bad returned without ado ozmin disappointed much grieue taking leaue mistresse went thither horse stood city vvith purpose returne late againe night might bee discouered forecast stood little stead lightning thunder haue fallen heauen though knew either burne dash piece one rogue amongst rest would rather lose life carry himselfe ciuilly towards onely end mischiefe villany scarce next night following set foot village knot madcap met together knowing abused night one sling another yard man borespeare batt staues spit sparing much peele maulkin ouens go mad dog ioyntly set vpon found better prouided night brought good iackes male steele murrians strong buckler one side might see stone cudgel lowd showtes many strong blowes cutting slash sword tumult stirre noyse thereof vvhole village seemed vp armes like little warre fierce fight appeare alonso crossing street vnawares vnluckie stone strooke brest fell ground wanting strength recouer himselfe returne afresh fight wherefore well could crawled vp withdrew himselfe aside ozmin meane time draue vp street working much harme sore hurt three left dead place tumult increasing whole village came stopt passage could though would neuer faine haue fled got one side turfebreaker sturdy stout rogue vvith barre doore strooke cruell blow shoulder forct vpon knee nothing benefit alcalde sonne could come double blow vpon gaue slash claue head twaine bin kid calfe leauing lying like tunny shore hauing rendred vp life satisfaction roguery many charged euery side laid load vpon vnable longer defend himselfe taken daraxa donna elvira saw heard past much sorrow see vnciuil outrage euen first beginning fray also coyle kept caught thus aliue hold bound hand behind cord beene one fellowrogues side intreated ill one buffetted another puncht third kickt throwing thousand disgracefull affront vvherewith sought reuenged wrong prisoner durst looke face beastly shamefull thing vse man thus able make resistance hand bound peace thing neuer done base villaines dogged clownes kind coorse vsage naturall proper vnto becomes daraxa brooke misfortune able without swouning see person thus basely abused much loue adore shadow one side see prisoner see wounded slaine honour lying midst betweene knew well enough case bee layd open luys force could aske ambrosio made occasion drew thither confusion necessity draue sit councell selfe course best taken preuent therefore farther mischiefe deuised letter sealed lockt vp little cabinet intent luys come vnto shee might make shew thereof owne discharge time day began appeare yet people quieted sent vnto city giue notice happened end information might taken thing past open businesse notary come began examine witness whereof many without called made voluntary appearance ill men themselues inuite themselues vnbidden onely desire ill enemy become friend condemne innocent sware ozmin sixe seuen besides himselfe company others seene come luys house cryde window kill kill others people towne resting secure quiet wilfully set vpon others came challenged house one man amongst sware truth god deliuer v clownes stiffe oakes toughnesse nature cruell hardhearted haue fruit must bee vsed like akornes beaten downe cudgel dry blowes sooner suffer themselues pluckt vp rootes though vtter ruine themselues estate bow stoope bee neuer little minded persecute man periure themselues thousand time though matter question worth straw onely inclination doe euill ill much worse wretch thinke god good seruice therein soules saued wonder confesse fault repent themselues rancour malicious poyson death wound receiued proud vpon poore gentleman laden yrons put safe custody luys soone notice hereof hastened village daughter informed businesse acquainting truly past inquired likewise daraxa told tale sent ambrosio come thither dispatch thence letter granada could get speake two night together beaten cudgel pelted stone though letter written lay ready shee could come deliuer hand luys desired would shew letter well see content thereof also owne discharge maiesties committed custody shee though seemed loth condescended last request gaue letter beit little intreaty would haue serued turne desired nothing haue see writt taking foorth cabinet sayd vnto giue vnto may perceiue truth conceiue ielousie vvrite thing vvorthy hiding luys tooke letter going reade found vvritten arabicke tongue wherein knowledge hee made inquirie one could reade interpret language content whereof signified vnto father vvhat griefe vvas vnto liue thus diuided desired certified welfare desire see ouersway respect liud otherwise full content woman world made luys owne child therefore besought acknowledgement kindnesse courteous intertainment vvould pleased remember present worthy desert like hurlyburlies vvords multiply together stirre report gatherstrength increase euery one canonizeth owne presumption according hee loue vvith began murmure luys people house mustard got vp already nose finger began itch like vvise discreet gentleman thought fit present dissemble matter seeming take little notice malicious proceeding remoued vvhole houshold returned backe city vvhilest thing thus succeeded granada yeelded selfe conquerours vpon condition chronicle mention forefather hath beene reported vnto v amongst noble vvere found time two fellowfatherinlawes alboaçen father ozmin alcayde de baça besought baptized desirous become christian vvhich ceremonie performed alcayde intreated maiesties hee might haue licence goe see daughter daraxa vvhich granted tolde aduised ere long alboaçen thinking sonne dead taken captiue vsed diligence know become could neuer get inkling thereof vvhich good reason vvas wondrous sad onely onely child also sonne well qualified descended rich noble parent onely hope house alcayde lesse feeling vvell loued dearely beene owne also griefe daraxa would conceiue vvhen come heare tidings heauy newes maiesties part dispatcht messenger vnto seuill expresse command luys presently without delay repaire vnto bring daraxa along vvith vvith respect good vsage wherwithall put trust vpon receipt letter acquainted order giuen vvas vvits end ready runne mad force vpon occasion depart grieuing thus go away see end businesse knowing would become sorrowing beyond measure dearest loue left behind prison need helpe must greatest extremity driuen leaue shift himselfe thought confusion imagination vvas troubled heart vveight griefes heauy lead calling selfe thousand time vnfortunate misfortune selfe wretched woman resoluing finish together loue lose life vvith perplexed almostsettled mind deliberation haue acted cruell errour vpon selfe token chaste true loue vvhich bare ozmin daraxa vvhose passion quite outgone iudgement like discreet lady correcting cruell determination taking vp selfe height speed resolued trust misfortune hand fortune enemy expecting whateuer vvould giue vtmost euill death vvould despaire game till saw last man borne resolution sufferance could stop sea teares burst swelling tide foorth eye stander supposed proceed ouerioy returne owne country deceiued euery one spake none comfort rodrigo came take leaue countenance bathed cristalline teares vvhich dropped heauenly eye spake vnto manner following noble rodrigo might well seeke perswade abundance reason good worke vvhich vpon present occasion pretend present vnto craue furtherance therein owne nature iust cannot forbeare aske grant selfe much interessed therein know though tell obligation haue good naturall diuine law speaketh particularly euery man soule conscience man barbarous ignorant thereof carry somuch force much stronger reason alledged amongst principal one least apply good vnto haue eaten bread intertained seruice know vnlike selfe intercession may seeme lesse needfull shall intreat hand know ambrosio seruant father first mine therefore bound doe hauing put himselfe default necessity wherin cause hand otherwise concerning interessed busines hand thrust danger sole causer therefore stand charged must put account therefore free debt desire giue content purpose binde vnto may euer remaine thankefull acknowledger loue kindnesse must laying vpon shoulder weighty care mine owne desire seeke meanes procure liberty reckoning mine request vnto indeuour earnestnesse doe desire luys haue euer found singular good lord goe hence vse possible diligence owne person friend kinsfolke one ayding absence may free mee debt stand ingaged rodrigo promised best parted poore lady left best beloued great perill life much grieued much much farther shee came granada shee seeme alonso though escaped hand yet sorely bruised brest forced keepe bed soundly clownes bangd afterwards heard companion carried prisoner seuill got bed posted thither tooke infinit paine trotting vp downe neuer ceasing sollicit friend cause case owne notwithstanding complaint plaintifes accusation witness euill inclination iudges either vpon information corruption fauouring defendant besides slaine wounded many could saue together diuers good friend condemned hanged common gallowes rodrigo great rage father himselfe find little respect hang vp seruant offended law equall hearing faire tryall side alonso stood much maintenance defendant saying bee permitted could law condemne gentleman nobly descended friend iayme uiues hanged case fault farre greater yet difference quality ought saue life least ought priuiledge hanging law matter deseruing death gentleman hanged beheaded iudges rest bench distracted case knew best doe rodrigo stile seruant alonço friend rodrigo pleades name ambrosio alonço iayme viues gentleman zaragosa feast buls made noble proofe valour whole citie could well witnesse turnament padrino champion brought vnhorst one challenger shewing day great token worth valour difference great name contrary quality alledged discrepant iudges cleere doubt resolued themselues take declaration thereof himselfe demanded whether gentleman hee answered nobly descended royall bloud name neither ambrosio iayme viues willed hee manifest name quality person whereunto made answer punishment might excuse discouering himselfe vndoubtedly dye necessary tell materiall suffer either one death desired deliuer whether hee man alonço reported brauely killd two buls gotten honour tourneyment replide neither name whereby called loth declare linage conceiuing thereby man quality demurred vpon busines see could worke truth know also winde reason two noble gentleman earnestly vndertake defence little startle saw whole city generally desire liberty stood strongly affected towards hereupon dispatched presently away zaragosa might learne truth giue knowledge birth hauing spent dayes therein vsed many diligencies could meet strict inquiry could giue notice might could deuise manner gentleman might either name signes token giuen failed describe full vnto returned ill dispatch albeit friend much importune magistrate iustice often require would lay open quality condition yet would possible perswade thereunto iudges time limited fully expired farther respite sore much pittying youth valour able crosse course iustice prest earnestly importunity aduerse party confirmed former fentence daraxa two father asleepe whilest thing made maiesties acquainted whole carriage businesse informed truth thereof many petition put vp sooner one memoriall giuen another drawing second fuit daraxa owne person sollicit life espoused husband begging way merced grace maiesties answered nothing thereunto yet secretly dispatched luys presently away kingly prouision iudges deliuer vnto bill whole inditement euery point taken beginning end together prisoner much concerne highnes seruice luys posted away commanded speed could whilest poore daraxa father fatherinlaw melted teares considering haste iudges would make dispatching poore innocent gentleman much feared petition receiued slowe answere knew say think long delaying without giuing answer either good bad least hope life exceedingly grieue knew helpe themselues left one stone vnremoued made meanes friend could daunt maine danger consist delay whilest thus strucken dump doubt vvhat comfort dangerous suspension luys heard spurred mayne much speed secresie entred gate seuill ozmin led forth prison carried execution street euery place past full people tumult noise person wept shed teares see handsome yong man well fauourd valiant wellbeloud famous deed publikely done bee vntimely cut sorrow see dye without confession made thinke escape death prolong life silent spake word shewd signe sadnesse lookes smiling kinde countenance beheld passed along made certaine stop see could exhort confesse himselfe labouring could perswade hee would lose body soule hee answered word held peace people continuing thus confusion citie wayting sad spectacle luys came making people giue way pressing throng hinder execution alguazils thought resistance iustice feare luys stout valiant gentleman dared oppose himselfe danger forsooke ozmin vnder guard great hurry clamour ranne giue account past magistrate whose authority thought neerly touched whereupon came know might cause great disrespect done vnto put hand pocket taking king order deliuered vnto great contentment willingly obeyed brought ozmin accompanied gentleman citie common ioy people luys house night hee intertained gallant maske setting vp many torch cressets streetes windowes giue generall content token great ioy would haue celebrated dayes hee stayed publike feast knew luys would giue vvay thereunto tying himselfe instruction carried prisoner along next morning kindely vsed well intertained vpon way according greatnesse ranke quality arriued granada hee kept secretly dayes vntill time order maiesties bring court come ioyed much sight whilest standing thus presence commanded daraxa called forth two louers thus suddenly met place vnexpectedly farre beyond hope euery man may make owne heart iudge wonderfull ioy receiued happy vnlooked incounter imagine himselfe thinke conceiue thereof others eye fed fill queene made towards told father become christian howbeit daraxa knew much desired doe like shee receiue singular fauour loue feare inforce thereunto saue onely god owne saluation howsoeuer whether would compell conscience pleasure instantly inioy liberty dispose estate person according owne pleasure ozmin would faine haue answered queene ioynts sinnewes body making many tongue render thankes maiesty great benefit signifying willing baptized addressing himselfe daraxa presence maiesties intreated doe like daraxa whose eye neuer dearest ozmin hungry beholding shedding sweet teares rosie cheekes directing lookes speech vnto maiesties told since god inlighten vnderstanding many tribulation bring knowledge truth disposed vnfeignedly true heart humbly submit selfe thereunto obedience maiesties vnder whose protection princely hand reposed selfe anon christened great deale ceremonie naming one ferdinand isabell according maiesties godfather godmother gaue name font within dayes nuptials celebrated great deale glory ostentation many present courtesy conferred vpon city liued lifetime left behinde illustrious noble offspring continueth yet day much honour reputation country went hearkening story great deale silence led attentiuely till came within sight caçalla seemed haue measured iust iourney truely one iumpe howbeit somewhat inlarged author flourished ouer finer phrase different soule haue deliuered vnto honest carrier remained mute beginning ending v began finde tongue first opened mouth alight master quoth hee heere must leaue way lye along path hee cals vnto come hither yong gallant let v make vp reckoning part heard almost ready hang selfe bitterest draught ere went downe throat ene said selfe well let goe verily beleeue past betweene v way friendship well dismounted got vp lightly came downe heauily knew world answer make saue onely aske much pay riding nine league see gentleman giue must lodging dyet pay three royal vmbles mule found deare meat vnto stucke little also stomake grieud money pay therefore came vnto told friend •… heere money reckning much say part shot horsehyre owe nothing selfe without intreatie mine desired get vp inuiting thereunto owne accord diuell quoth meane marry gupp murraine fine gentleman indeed doe thinke ride cockhorse free cost pretty youth indeed replyde vpon fall scuffling clergyman inter posed themselues vmpire businesse betweene v condemned pay meat beast night making euen reckoning purse hauing left world twenty marauedis beare charge night muletier went businesse clergyman selfe entred cacalla take leaue euery man betaking himselfe owne way rogve first part life gvzman de alfarache second booke wherein treated came rogue beeing happened vnto chapter guzman de alfarache going caçalla towards madrid proues quality condition miserable man vpon occasion grauely discourseth effect want shame castle ayre came serue host wicked disposition kind men thov seest mee caçalla twelue league seuill vpon munday morning purse pennilesse patience remedilesse accused haue heard thiefe way prophecie presaging bee hereafter suffered inough first day set forth second care increased rained downe hard vpon wet already one mischiefe ouertaking another lately money purse meate put belly griefes los duelos con pein son menos prouerbe better ouerpast bread good haue father good haue mother haue meat put man mouth better third day day death full load misery found selfe like leane dogge barked others grinning teeth vpon came round turning head daring bite care continued barking hauing hedgd set vpon troubled mee withall spend meanes defray necessary expences knew blanca small price •… oney lat assis effect want blanke meant doth seeke gather doth make reckoning know woorth thereof till feeles want first time lookt hereticke necessity face knew character afterwards better consider effect many dishonest action doth venture cruell imagination doth represent vnto thee infamous thing doth sollicite disorder doth driue thee impossibility doth attempt weighed also selfe little mother nature contented hauing giuen much many yet none rest contented cry poore publishing want world thou epicure thou ryotous glutton thou lauish prodigall dost thou talk thus foolishly thou eatest swallowest downe many thousand ducat yeerely say rather thou haft much rent comming thou keepst thy hand thou eatst thou doest eate doest thou keepe complaining seeing thou art man selfe poore lentil dry fitch old beanes hard pea bisket •… enowed moth▪ eaten keepes fat faire haue daintier feeding thou wilt tell canst thou thinke giue reason bee cause part know euer thou hast beene want shouldst possible put shift thy selfe driuen need lacke thou wouldst able tell mee another tale vvish man ill lucke onely lament mine owne misfortune mistresse necessity best 〈◊〉 thing subtill nuentresse thrush pyes iackdawes parrats taught speake plainely began perceiue aduersitie make men vvise instant thought adver •… make men wise discouered new light cleare glasse represent vnto mee thing past thing present thing come till present meere cockney well might name sute breeding prouerbe hijo de la viuda bien consentido mal dotrinado sonne widow well fed ill taught many chip hewne first stroke axe vvas trouble light vpon wound maine timber touch quicke know indeere vnto thee saw selfe abandoned dangerously ingulphed knew find harbour put port saue selfe yeeres experience lesse fitting haue beene greater worst knowing manifest signes ruine
