quoth aduocate thus little little like many horseleech went sucking bloud mee till scarce left one drop like cluster grape quite dryde away withered nothing yet notwithstanding misery fit passe ouer silence passed betwixt wench selfe much euery morning soone day rayned downe manna vpon found helpe furnished thing necessary rigour imprisonment vpon sentenced teniente gallyes sent letter pleasant witty one thought good make knowne vnto also amisse slacken string vnbend bowe recounting something may serue intertainment letter spake maner sen̄or guzman de alfarache heartsioy hope comfort deare loue though great griefe poore condemned slaue letter guzmans wench lamenting misfortune write line end vnto thee saue perswade thee cast away sorrowe take comfort vnto thee let suffice sweetheart haue none let alone mourne thee euer since saint iames day two clock afternoone thou wast first apprehended whilest thou layst quietly asleepe hardhearted would let thee take thy nap soule hath much sorrowed thee farther increaseth affliction sad newes brought day eares teniente hath adiudged thee two hundred stripe tenne yeeres continuance gallyes god lash shoulder whip wyer knottiest seuerest scourge wrath let liue slaue dayes life gallies rot dye well appeares wish thee well doe knowes bitternes teares shed thee little thinke deare thy loue cost iuliana wish tell thee thou shouldst foorthwith appeale appeale twenty time shall seeme fitting vnto thee take care nothing grace god doubt shall goe well inough end tyrannicall teniente shall see though grieue thou shalt euer remaine prisoner pride sweare vowe vnto thee mulata maid child borne negra fayre man contrary extraordinary mixtur •… cō pare one mule mulata face make remember long hee liues teares hee hath drawne mine eye haue beene many much adoe keepe world knowledge haue powred foorth till haue growne great riuers feared haue beene drowned neuer haue inioyed thee faith owe vnto thee neuer cease weeping till fountaines teares swell high may come swimming vnto thee drawe thee dungeon wherevnto soule chayned remayneth prisoner thee iuliana tell thee tore haire heard bad newes haue sent thee twenty royalls thou mayst followe thy suite merry thou mayst thou wouldst thinke howbeit knewe time ceremony needed betweene thee mee beene minute houre thee staying longer away put fewe cole vnder pot thou didst thinke thousand yeeres remember sweet slaue pretty cagebird loue adore thee receiue greene girdle hand token good hope haue mine eye shall quickly see thee set free supply thy want needfull sold brand face two hot yrons set slaues marke eyther cheeke make sale open market assure thy selfe shall esteeme greatest happines fall bondage may worke thy freedome thou tellst soto thy camarade ill neuer well since hangman dealt roughly strand string hard made change note racking much needed farther confession grieues heart man spirit cowd vile base fellow feare forced confesse owne men fault commend vnto though vnknowne tell hartily sorry share part conserues send deare loue haue made shift saue thee tomorrow kneading day wherein must mould vp bread put loaues ouen shall make thee friendly cake butter finely thee thou shalt ashamed bid thy best friend eating send foule linnen shift dayly may keepe selfe cleane sweete since mine armes cannot imbrace thee shall tyre weary themselues thy seruice willing doe thing may giue thee content mistris sweares shee hang thee sayes haue robd knowe sure haue robd another prouerb knowe knowe wise man buen entendedor pocas palabras word sufficient usher gomez shall come see thee talke thou doest circumspect thou sayst vnto man carry two face vnder one hood seekes insinuate himselfe men bosomes fift besides great friend cup wine drunken tongue neeed tell thee blab knowes aduertise thee end heere end yet neuer end pray vnto god preserue thee free thee filthie dungeon thy chamber houre midnight cont emplation sweet heart solely wholy bestowed thy bestbeloued selfe thy slaue till death wench oyle maintained weeke aliue time trouble otherwise would haue gone liud great charge expences many though made haruest gathered great deale together yet melted away like salt water butter fire mother likewise sawe bad tearmes suite stood told robd conceiue thinke truly meaning hold fast saw purpose let goe whereupon inforced doe rest follow currant plea still went wanted money maintayne cause could corrupt escriuano nothing wherewithall bribe iudge highly incenst hope working proctor hee slept busines would stirre foote solicitor fled far leg would carry iuyce bunch grape wasp gone way left alone pronounced sentence effect whereof set vpon asse ride stript waste round towne receiue many stripe cryer proclayming offence done remaine six yeeres gallyes saw must bee made gallyslaue redemption punishment put brazen face matter grew carelesse man either sight censure playd part without feare shame king slaue men reach danger hauing nothing doe yet comfort vnto camarade soto condemned like punishment like couple louing curres bee tyde together one payre couple wee fellowes companion one prison one dungeon runne v one carreere willing might haue beene good amitie betweene v true loue ought haue beene man haue gone better shall see hereafter playd traytor notable squeezegrape huge quaffer glasse bee alway brimfull would vp de profundis vsuall draught large pint halfe hauing drunke liberally came rack thinking would haue made lesse sensible paine confest first whatsoeuer would haue seeing receiud doome remedy least hope thereof redemption willing try fortune neuer yet friend beene miracle fayld feignd selfe sicke fifteene dayes neuer came dungeon rose bed fifteene dayes end hauing prouided selfe woman apparell hauing shaud beard cleane away razour putting guzman seekes break prison cloathes casting mantle ouer painting face dawbing first white giuing little tincture red night past thorow two vpper doores belonged gallery neither porter said word let passe quietly yet quickesighted inough eye cleere sound came downe doore open street ready put foot ouer threshold blinkeeyde porter one guzman preuented purpose eye would god beene blinde clap arme athwart posterne kept backe lookt vpon presently knew wherevpon shuts doore prouided selfe good short arming sword one need would haue done deed carried closely chance put shift haue occasion vse ill lucke would haue bore mee time could doe good stand stead world aggrauation fault accusation made criminall well turnd vp stayres fulminating new processe guzman condemned life gallies condemnd gallies life small courtesie mee make mee ride cloathes vp downe citie heretofore done like disgrace vnto others thought haue auoided danger fell vpon death chapter viii guzman de alfarache taken prison seuill bee carried port put gallies hee recounteth befell way likewise gallies gallyslaue come end ordained wherevnto lewd course meanes bring mee must leade life rest fellowes doe indure like fortune must pull rope tugge oare content selfe poore fare others wretched condition allowd one band braggards de los de dios e christo one company confesse christ bee god haue cognizance faith workes march vnder colour conduct diuell put white linnen breech colourd stockins cut doublet holland nightcap vvhich kinde louing mulata sent liuing hope time dice would turne might one day see againe libertie helpe fee recouered due vnto new prisoner came led fine gentle life also life gentile qualitie admitted famous schoole deale roguery profest got oyle lampe money purse partly men deuotions partly mine owne indeuours lend vpon pawnes euery single royall made dayly eight quarto make royall made halfepenny better euery sixe penny quarte profit fresh men newly come amongst v one scapt finger came vnder hand paid soundly asleepe would play wagge putting snuffe candle top shooe holding match brimstone vnder nose rolling card let smoke runne vp nostril till ready choake thousand like knauish trick albeit god knowne yet hee feared haue wicked condition gallyslaues respect vnto many pagan part come like misery ruffian highway robber brutish beastly kinde people must either great wonder misfortune one come thither falleth reason god blindeth vnderstanding end leading way may bring acknowledgement sinne may time come clearer knowledge learne serue saued ruffian notable shauer time whilest condemned death put enfermiria quarter tale ruffian sicke cured whence taken forth next day executed seeing guarding playing threehand primera rose banke made well hee could crawling along two paire fetter great chaine asking whither would hee told come hither passe away time guard charge told fitter betake himselfe prayer recommend himselfe soule vnto god wherevnto answered haue prayd already pray haue one prayer left haue doe haue done already therefore shufflle deale fill wine let cup walke may wash away sorrow rid away care ready choake heart replyde late tauerne doore shut getting goe tell said fellow keepes thats inough warrant hee deny therefore word master play follow sport sweare vnto know become businesse issue thereof dance tune others haue head beard neatly trimmd may seeme handsomer come gallowes said proper men wellfauourd likewise take order haue fine cleane starchtruffe daintily curiously set seeming perhaps vnto wearing bearing bigotes high turnd vp hot iron stiffened gum saluation bring heauen good philosophy men complexion follow generally goodnesse badnesse meat may likewise good bad company keepe whence grew prouerbe prou con quien naces si con quien pace con quien naces si con quien pace must iudge men birth breeding conuersation must giue denomination one like barbarous illbred fellow would faine imploy little money renting one bodegones belonging prison fearing day would sudden b bodegon poore vittailing house strike vp alarme might chance lose doe thinke well wee beganne make number sixe twenty gallyslaues grown vnruly prison ho v keeper halfe afraid wee would make hole meshe finde time get net therefore laboured hee could discharged v one munday morning wee called vp giuing euery one v testimoniall sentence wee chained one another guzman rest gallyslaues deliuered ouer commissary thus threaded vpon foure chaines wee deliuered ouer commissary conuey v little iourneys port faire softly foot foot could hale haltred legges v pace like iron heauy manner went seuill great griefe sorrow parent kinsfolke good friend went tearing hayre past along streetes scratching face nayles euery one according loue respect shee bare vnto friend side pulling hat ouer eye went along like many meeke gentle lambes lyonlike looke haughty carriage wont heretofore brauing outfacing matter could doe good arrogancie request would serue turne cannot deny touch part quicke went heart mee especially called minde merry life led good state wherein liud grace keepe selfe well well see misery wherevnto come begin thinke selfe bee painefull vnto mee already chaine doe much torment scarce indure feele trouble befall wood greene doe growes old dry torment feele condemned euer perpetuall paine musing vpon thing past along thorow streetes seuill mother come accompanie willing see mee onely man amongst solus cum solo left alone selfe walkt along leisurely god wot slowly inough yet fast could conueniently chaine slacke offering goe forward next fellow would oftentimes pull mee backe hee could sometimes doe withall sometimes againe would stop set purpose necessarie occasion require another foundred going barefoot rest ready sinke vvere weary wee men sensible paine men case none cause sorrow yet amongst selues griefes equall little aduantage one another wretched miserable state liue many various vnfortunate chance wee necessarily obliged wee came place called la cabeças went morning thence wee scarce gone halfe league one company espide farre certaine yong fellow going towards seuill great many fine little young pig giuing word one another wee presently battellwise cast selues wing turkish gallies marshalling selues manner halfe moone wee orderly fashion set vpon point horne meeting kinde circlewise inclining wee shut pigges sudden incompast gallyslaues rob poore fellow pigges carrying market could get amongst v spight young fellowes teeth doe could life euery one v made purchase fat pigge fellow began cry aloud making great exclamation intreating commissary god sake hee would take order might haue againe hee seemed deafe would heare eare one haue greatest share bootie wee past along prey leauing poore clowne goe seeke remedy elsewhere wee knew worst alreadie care pitie much one noone wee came inne wee rest selues little sleepe passe ouer heat day commissary called v share hee haue theft consenting therevnto accessorie haue much principall assentant assaylant hee commanded one bee rosted wherevpon arose great stirre tumult amongst v ready goe together eares whilest arguing case v part pigge amongst v slaues matine pig scarce three v vse reason saw mutiny amongst carriage busines might iustly blame vnderstanding guzman offer commissary said vnto master commissary pigge heere ready seruice dispose please shall thinke fit seeing heere guard sufficient vpon v may please comaund vnchaine take paine dresse mine owne hand haue reliques yet remayning good cooke thankefully accepted ciuill compliment said vnto company heere vnder charge must truely confesse vnto thee haue since first knowledge thee obserued thee certaine kind noblenes free nature cannot proceed good blood therfore thanke present take kindely hand shall glad eate shall order taken chayne recommended guard dress calld thing necessary inne ill prouided thing would haue shewe cookerie could shew skill farther well rosting fewe egg battered together seasoned little pepper salt would haue made pudding bellie wanted necessary minced liuer thing could present made sauce pigge knewe well doe time trauaylours came take ease little sorry finde v halfe afraid eares scarce sure head amongst company rogue table whereat sit wàs long planke neeere adioyning bench stone eate altogether commissary kindly saluted fewe compliment exchanged betweene sate three file one taking portmantua vnto putting betweene legges vnder boord likewise layd alforjas wallet wherein cheese bottle wine peice gammon bacon might better take thrust portmantua little forward leauing alforjas midst betweene legges saw warie began suspect without cause calling hostesse knife closely clapt betweene arme sleeue puting great earthen iarre full water vnderneath boord bottle wine commissary might haue fresh coole hee call oft stoopt downe powre wine little little fell fingering portmantua till last hauing made shift vndoe button giuing gentle slash close chaine ranne along made fast nimbly tooke two little bundle somwhat guzman filches two fardles trauailours portmantua maner weighty withall presently conuayd handsomely gallysloppes searoome inough afterwards buttoning vp iust fashion close well signe seene theft made made end dinner cloth taken away hauing paid reckoning away went trauailours likewise began prouide packing also gone soto camerade fastned another chayne somwhat farther mee soto guzmás companion notable thiefe could haue wisht little grieue distance hinder priuate talke brought back againe chayne came vnto secretly deliuered vnto two bundle desiring keepe safe mee till meete better occasion knowe receiued great deale ioy killing pigge vnknowne thrust body placing intralls mouth wound well bundle might droppe also hide soto cunning cleanly conuayance theft thereby better sight going put chayne intreated cómissary doe fauour might filed next old friend acquaintance willingly granted request one taken file ranked together selfe exchanging place went lazily along fashion pacing leisurely step rounded soto softly eare said vnto camarade hast thou done gaue thee keepe hast thou disposd hee knowne mee giuen thing made strange hee made suspect according custome country hee drunke cup much might happely haue forgot wherevpon went putting minde gaue hee still denyde deliuerie end grew somewhat hot angry asking mee whether drunke well wit demand thing make beleeue deliuered either vnderstand neither know haue anything therefore say vnto mee must goe looke nothing nothing like get mee cannot imagine able expresse great anger sorrow vnthankefully dealt withall receiue hard measure one done many good office loud truely morsell meat went downe throat whereof share money purse whereof diuide halfe purpose likewise share mee hee thus breake soto becomes enemy guzman bond friendship deny insolently impudently euer giuen thing troubled vext mee heart man ill condition concoction good hee moued vpon word mine patience thundring voice beganne bolt oathes blasphemy insomuch commissarie inforced correct cudgell relying fauour shewne intreated beare angry choller cause intemperancie desirous know cause distemperature began apprehend selfe soto would reserue made reckoning selfe shall acquaint commissarie guzman cryes quittance soto past betweene v may bee though haue yet least part bootie might fall share thiefe thought shall carry away hee shall haue thankes laugh done bee thus gulld therefore resolued selfe acquaint whole successe businesse presumed would little glad greedy couetous desire would haue take bone v two stroue herevpon informed commanded soto presently giue giuen stoutly denies hee thing guard willd search doe done vtmost diligence could finde thing least signe token thereof wherevpon gathered done deliuering ouer body keepe safe told commissary question made secretly conuayd away one company really truly receiued gaue vnto mine owne hand saw neither faire meanes foule perswasions threatnings course hee tooke could brought manifest truth bring thing light commissary commanded take aside put racke till make confesse instrument saue cord applide lower part vpon twisting began straine somewhat hard vpon flesh delicate sensible indure torture likewise fainthearted fellow little courage hee forthwith confessed whither conuayd therevpon presently tooke pigge lost bargaine taking intrals see quickly lighted two little bundle either rosario set bead perfectest daintiest pure corall euer mine eye saw euery bead end hauing cap gold much graced neat cutting inameling bestowed vpon seeme sent token two seuerall person commissary make adoe presently clap vp pocket promising befriend giue mee selfe aske soto herewith madded extremely incensed forced change chaines set v farther asunder though thus diuided parted afterwards fall manacling fastning wrist together bolt iron came stone would take vp throw troublesome manner came last vnto gallies iust vpon nicke calking rigging making ready put forth sea goe chase brought v aboord carried v prison wee past ouer night like commoditie trouble time nay rather worse v heretofore prison little crammd full euer could hold better bee worse wee forced take good part make good shift could could doe would make choise 〈◊〉 place liking commissary talkt meane king officer came gallies king alguazil hauing assigned appointed v bankes wee sit rowe gaue commissary discharge deliuering many slaues hand told mee would come see would stand good friend betooke mule day forward neuer set eye tooke v prison leade v along gallies ordered wee bee diuided fell wee goe sixe sixe fyle diuision ill lucke thankes sinnes laid punishment vpon haue soto camerade done presently deliuered v ouer certaine moorish slaues halfe pike came guard v along tying hand tough thong brought purpose away goe come aboord gally whereinto entred wee willed retire selues poope till captaine mastersmate come call v one one placing euery man banke thought fit come amongst v went walking vp downe coursey gallerielike space side whereof slaues bankes placed whilest looking bankes aduising themselues fittest dispose v gallyslaues began set throat cry aloud vnto desiring would disperce v amongst complaining vnprofitable member amongst others banke weake feeble person vnable doe seruice captain •… mastersmate giuing eare clamour gouerning themselues owne discretion hauing considered fittest done placed v heere saw cause partition fell lot ranked second banke iust cookeroome neere vnto mastersmates cabin foot mast hauing placed soto patrone master banke grieud much seated neere vnto regard late quarrell beene betweene v wee could neuer afterwards indure one another lesse could malitious minded man intertained heart deep hatred though part neuer deny friendship euer wanting vnto whensoeuer occasion vse like commissary would haue himselfe haue let alone haue good thought hee would haue cryde quits mee paid mee home mine owne coyne brought mee banke bade mee welcome requitall whereof could haue wisht beene able say vnto excuse cannot come installed seat put king robe vpon two guzman indured gallies shirt two paire linnen breech colourd wastecoat red cap scarce warme seat base vnderbarber come vnto mee better shauer cutter razor make head beard bare hand tooke heart great account made thereof recollecting spirit beganne comfort selfe fortune world others beene farre higher place falne farre greater misery remoued eye mee looked towards behinde considering much selfe many happy many wretched looking downeward comfortable thing man misery albeit true life almost miserable gallyslaue yet halfe bad indured vvith first wife comfort besides vnto mee lone man affliction many fellowes suffered like torment yong fellow belonged alguazil made presently towards mee clappe fetter foot manacle hand chaining mee companion sate together banke fast sure wee could stirre thence giue mee allowance sixe twenty ounce bisket fell day call dia de caldero caldron day boiling flesh making pottage newcomer vnprouided woodden dish tooke part mammocks shared amongst v one fellowes sate mee would offer soke bisket chewd downe dry freshman doe first till time taught mee vse armes paine put present little nothing gallies trimming calking wee ghing base rout raskalitie gallies serud vse row towards shore wee commanded make prouision boughes something else shade lest heare sunne melt tallow cloathes brought aboord mee gally made show sold vvhich yeelded mee money though much adding little summe brought came prison know world might secretly lay vp keepe safe either relieue mee necessity vsually offer themselues imploy one thing might haue penny purse pinch neither coffer chest much deske locke key might safely lay vp somewhat trouble able deuise selfe best doe carry still mee runne hazzard beeing robbd coozend owne camerades commit another body keeping already late experience ill correspondence kinde saw ill concernd looke well vnto bethinke selfe dispose last long consideration resolued selfe could giue better secret place clappe bosome lay neere heart could possibly bring others put heart put treasure tooke cleane contrary course putting treasure heart well got needle thread clapping thimble finger fell worke made mee vp little purse bignesse waxkernell strongly sowed quilted many sure stitch vpon part shirt toucht vpon heart bare neuer suffering sight hauing still eye vpon might bee safer friend enemy would bee euer anon leering way casting sheepes eye towards hee whose mouth watered month minde notable famous thiefe camerade sate next vnto mee could neuer come filch mee neither midnight time surely guard side yet hee wanting doe best perceiud asleepe hee would goe groping heere visiting euery part mee hand roomes housholdstuffe belongd vnto much easily quickly runne ouer hee past ouer trice little satchell side gabardine breech come last wastecoat might properly haue termed soule warmth viuifie quicken bloud whereby sustained selfe kept aliue wee labourd hard hee robbe keepe crafty carefull time strip selfe naked vvould order businesse impossible take vnder mee vnlesse tooke mee away hee continued long time care come watching opportunity rob meane forasmuch consider selfe wheresoeuer man liues hee need angell guard attend vpon occasion beganne bethinke selfe make choyse bee protector thorowly thought therevpon could finde fitter turne mastersmate albeit true captaine lord chiefe commander rest bee accounted onely protector v yet authoritie greatnesse place hee trouble himselfe raskall rabble part principall person men qualitie vouchsafe looke low reckon poore snake take notice willinger make choyce mastersmate neere neighbour cabbin close banke meanes whereof might easier conueniently serue much rather desirous settle vpon hee carried cudgell possession salt eele hee distributed amongst v either lesse according fauourd disfauourd paying soundly letting others goe scotfree thus little little went scruing selfe seruice getting ground still vpon striuing outstrip rest vvell attendance boord hauing bed trickt vp cabbin brusht cloathes kept neat handsome lookt linnen euery respect diligent within dayes onely man eye account small fauour hee would deigne mee good looke seeming vnto mee oft hee lookt vpon mee hee bestowd bull meane pizzle vpon mee free indulgence stripe hee thereby absolue mee à culpa poena fault punishment thereof therein deceiued beeing naturally seuere cruell commonly kinde sterne austere men put place neuer haue eye consider courtesy seeking requite good punish ill people acknowledge thankefulnesse wee doe thinke bee due vnto night ridde dandruffe head rubbd foot fannd face destroyed gnat waited obseruance punctualitie greatest prince world could bee better serued serue prince loue like mastersmate feare lest hoope hogshead eeles tayle twine selfe shoulder kinde weapon neuer goe without howbeit bee true manner seruice perfect noble yet feare make men take heed saw hee waking minde sleepe would entertaine merry fable pleasant historie passe away time better neuer vnprouided company witty iests fine conceit make worship laugh small comfort mee see looke cheerefully grew grace happy particular yet much priuieto mine owne worth good seruice deserue hee would saue selfe serue thing gaue greatest content especiall reason esteeme fauour towards mee regard hee gallyslaue hee entertained attended person though hee vsed well yet hee went dayly pyning consuming away hee sorry see though hee led better life rest hee loud well fed owne trencher bestowd best morsel vpon yet like gaetacolts better feed worse proue one day wee together waiting table said vnto mee prethe guzman tell met thou art scholler vnderstanding fellow bee reason fermen first comming gallies able body strong fat lusty hauing sought continue still state entertaining seruice friendly office eating good morsell whereof hee hath part make fall thou seest away whereunto made answere sir giue resolution question needfull relate vnto another case like vnto new christian past thorow hand holyhouse commonly call inquisition short tale new christian one inquisition neighbour man rich powerfull liud honourably plentifull fashion led merry life waxed plump fat thing neate handsome tooke much content house wherein dwelt fell one inquisitor came tooke house next doore reason world saue wasso neere neighbour vnto grewe meager leane thereupon within short time brought lowe pined fast away nothing skinne bone shall giue solution another like accident shall deliuer truth vnto thus muley almançor king granada great priuado storie king granada fauourite buferiz principall fauourite called el alcayde buferiz wise man punctuall trusty hauing many good part worthy great loue lord master bare vnto king loud dearely also trust confidence difficulty world would wade thorow might make maiesties seruice deserue kinde honour euermore enuyd vnworthy wanting hearing king speake loue affection towards fauourite said vnto sir maiestie may see whether bee true much commend alcayde would pleased make proofe busines importance difficultie shall finde whether maner man take bee diligence shall vse therein maiestie shall truly knowe whether heart king liked exceeding well motion said command busines difficult one impossible effected causing forthwith called said vnto alcayde haue thing giue charge must accomplish hand vpon paine displeasure losse fauour shall deliuer ouer vnto good fat weather shall keepe home owne house shall giue allowance meat wont haue heretofore hee eate within moneth must returne back vnto poore leane rake poore moore whose desire neuer serue king punctually performe whatsoeuer hee bee pleased cōmaund beit beleeue neuer able bring impossibilitie passe therewith dismayed whit readily cheerfull countenance receiuing weather caused craryed home house according king commaunded sitting downe deuising himselfe might bring busines giue satisfaction master desire hee began set wit aworke last lighted vpon strange yet naturall conceit presumed would make much purpose cumply vvith king commaund hee caused two woodden cage bee made hand strongly barrd equall bignesse gaue order placed neere one put weather hard wolfe weather gaue full allowance wolfe kept short still exceeding hungry almost famished want meate labour could thrusting legges within grate reach weather try hee could come eate fearefull weather much troubled sorry heart see himselfe neere mortall enemy although eate gaue thriue ill continuall feare waxe fat pind away till pure skinne bone course taken returned time apoynted weather back againe king failing commauned falling accustomed grace fauour may apply story purpose wee haue hand seemeth vnto mee fermin growne leane feeble beeing neere liuing grace fauour doth feare hath much desire serue make thriue better mastersmate well pleased tale mine fell pat purpose presently gaue order haue remoued banke receiuing seruice giuing charge wardrobe table hee alwaies found suitable desire fauour shewed vnto mee great releasing obligation slaue exercising duty required galley would forbeare mine owne pleasure come sometimes amongst doe would mine owne accord fall labour might bee seeke necessity chance put vnto learne knit stockins make false dice highmen exercise gallyslaues lowmen setting two ace one another two six one dye coggers cheater vse made would pay well likewise learnd make button silke haire also dainty delicate toothpick diuers sundry inuentions colour neatly guilded none galley could besides selfe poyze put ballāce standing vpon euen termes forced goe galley cadiz mast mainyards sayles pitch tarre tallowe like necessary voyage first wherein put paine much friended mastersmate force doe worke would selfe seeme bee matter great labour might shewe selfe idle spectator seeke auoyd painestaking especially wee giue chase forced betake selues flight case rowe liues tugge strength force oare port good hauen friend vsually lye quiet neuer whipt intertainements pastime presuming port port especially neere needed sinewes oxe hale pull would need set selfe oare try manner thing slight easie thing tooke forced goe towing mast mainyards wee came cast anchor nothing wearines sweat would leaue oare giue occasion others murmur withdrawing hand mine owne pleasure voluntarily vndertaken sole cause soone soundly master bed fell asleepe falling like stone flat ground giuing good signes token thereof camerades heard doe neuer heard doe wit snort like yong sucking pigge traytour mine owne banke first neerest vnto heard rout calling softly another fellowes consort one good friend might best trust acquainted desire good occasion offered robbe little money ioynd together well manner sharing taking gone cleare guzman robd galleyslaues away alcalde friend tooke easily mee could wish passing presently banke banke end galley perswading themselues night perceiued stiffely denying without adoe carry away prey deuide spoyle day began wake amongst rest got vp heauie sleepe light purse weight wont feele lying vpon heart felt much trouble trouble lookt found money gone strooke dead doorenayle death face knew doe held peace heare newes must giue lost speake thereof roast part thereof prouerb vpon finger put mine eye get bargaine put possession inioyed long whereupon said selfe hath taken giue thankes much lesse shall reape benefit better notwithstanding keeepe may time wanting make acknowledgement thereof last may come punished mee wrong least eate meate sorrow hee see shall reape profit counsaile please mee mastersmate ready rise brought cloathes making himselfe ready made hima long relation misfortune making cost knowe touch hande miserie men hauing purst vp penny great deale labour painestaking earning hardly either mischance pilfering hand depriued thereof instant telling moreouer brought money seuill amongst likewise put made cloathes sold came aboord galley kept charily could life might therewith either relieue necessity occasion serue else imploy one thing might yeeld profit opening minde thus vnto likewise opened bosome shewd false stuffing wherein put mold indented marke whereof theeues left behinde world kinde print hare leaues forme newly gone seemed mastersmate told euident truth giuing credit vnto strengthened beliefe empty forme hare vsd sit also loue hee bare vnto commaunded two forebankes six rere coramnobis whereupon alguazils seruant cōming amongst good rope end seafaring men manner bea •… ing gallyslaues call salt eele gaue euery one fifty sound blowes apiece made wheales bunch vpon back leauing skinne clinging close vnto examining first euery one himselfe whether seene heard stolne money beene well lasht washt salt tart vineger rubbing wound therewith leauing backes side rent torne beene men theft hapned chance gypsie asleepe purse stolne turne came receiue payment hee confest hee seene companion night rise owne banke goe mine wherefore knew slaue perceiud hee spake hee chargd maner started vp foot said intangled chaine belonged banke hee sprained foot thereby wrung wrenched hee faine giue himselfe ease clamber ouer thither disintangle himselfe reason weake hold water carried fairenesse bee taken iust excuse much lesse knew well inough foot hee halted tooke presently taske many stripe bestowed vpon rest mastersmate angry alguazils seruant hee lay soundly •… hee would haue hee gaue order hee presently haue many bestowd vpon besides great many hee himselfe owne hand laid vpon hoope hogshead cholericke humour mightily moued hee forthwith commanded take delinquent hand againe baste long could stand ouer poore man inough hee saw hee must goe geare againe began thinke himselfe mastersmate would neuer giue ouer till hee confest truth therefore held bee best course deale plainely truely vvho money meanes came plot laid get mee excusing himselfe best hee could purpose himselfe doe neuer entred businesse otherwise drawne well hee well lasht afterwards offence money guzman recouers lost money returned backe vnto mee receiued goodwill master hand aduising mee withall imploy making profit thereof hee bee well pleased vvith thing vvere good good fortune like froth beganne increase regard gaue master good content gallies beeing goe forth ioyne naples vpon certaine imployment sea got mee ashore hauing souldiour guard bee keeper looke safe returne imployed little money matter victuallage presently setting forth thence would double cost succeeded well gaines master leaue made mee sute fashion old gallyslaue one beene ancient standing amongst hose wastecoat black buckram listed welted handsomely seames summer season cooler fresher fitter turne thinking vpon former misfortune beganne haue glimpse light inioy follow vertue protesting firme resolution settled constancie rather dye doe base action onely study might serue master might please humour giue content might keepe cloathes cabbin table cleane neat thinking considering thing said one night guzman discourse tels v onely vertue goodnesse brings man heauen selfe guzman thou seest heere top mountaine misery wherevnto thy filthy sensualitie hath brought thee art thou come highest part must either make speedy leape downe bottomlesse pit hell thou mayst easily doe lifting vp thy armes take hold heauen thou seest care thou hast serue thy master feare stripe vvhich giuen day felt morrow thou doest watch late rise vp early thou art diligent carefull sollicitous seeking new inuentions wherewith delight purchase fauour thou hast obtained man mastersmate thou canst make thou well knowest canst ignorant thou hast beene profest student hast studied point much lesse god requires thy hand much hath conferre vpon thee farre greater friend hee man vnto thee rouze vp thy selfe therefore awake heauy sleepe oppresseth thy soule returne home vnto thy selfe consider though true thy sinnes haue brought thee hither yet apply thy punishment vnto thee lay neere thy heart thou mayst make good vse may turne thy good thou hast sought stocke imploy thy profit seeke obtaine eternall happinesse lay thou hast thou maist buy iewell inestimable worth cannot valued thy trouble thy misery thou indurest thy care thou takest serue thy master put god account bee diligent seruing charge also thou art lose hereafter hee beare burthen charge hee lessen thine adde owne account thou maist buy grace heretofore bore price thee euen best deseruings saint euer cannot raise stocke whereby able buy till merit meet sauiour christ make much rather seeing christ may communicate grace vnto v willingly become brother brother euer forsake good louing brother serue sigh teare true heartsorrow grieuing thy sinnes angry offended thy selfe thou hast offended good brother giuing thou hast hee ioyne thy stocke owne making infinit price thine merit thou shalt enioy life euerlasting discourse vvith selfe rose spent great part night showring downe teares aboundance guzmans conuersion waxing heauy griefe sinnes fell asleepe awakt found selfe another manner man cast old heart put new one place gaue thankes vnto god regeneration hee renued spirit aright humbly beseeching would vphold holy hand strengthen mee grace presently vpon treated frequent confession sinnes reformation life cleansing conscience good deliberation continued many dayes flesh bloud still stumble almost euery step tooke fall proceeding accustomed euill action much amended went time forward reforming former course life howbeit exercised selfe much forepassed ill deportment still pointed finger wicked man name could neuer claw sticke close vnto euill followes euill men euen good action vvhich doe leaue iealousie suspition behinde occasion scandall see though doe neuer well vpright heart yet wee held bee hypocrite haue common prouerbe amongst v que se sacan por la uisperas los dia santos prouerb •… sacan por la visperas los dia santos vesper come know feast saint precedent action would iudge future giue world leaue censure thing list let would faine know whether hee stand state grace liue god loue fauour looke consider himselfe god worketh shall easily come know vse thy best endeuours doe good christian thou art bound doe shall thy workes bee acceptable sight thou shalt know like abel god well pleased thy sacrifice hee hath set eye vpon thee marke obserue whether hee v thee worse hee v himselfe sure infallible signe thy lord loues thee bread hee eateth cloathes hee weareth table hee take meales seat vvhereon sitteth wine whereof drinketh bed whereon lyeth make difference betweene thee one god inioy god loue god suffer trouble god shall share thee hee shewes hee trouble signes god loue towards v loues thee thou art minion feast thee make much thee thou wise receiue thing thankefully make profit doe thou thinke god refuse giue thee thine owne heart desire thy pleasure thy contentment rich large possession else may delight thee close fisted niggardly couetous thou art willing see worth worldly comfort turne thine eye aside looke vpon possesse greatest aboundance euen moore infidel heretiques god runnes contrary course friend elected best beloued child cherishments blandishment bestowes vpon pouerty affliction persecution knowne much heretofore doe god would haue pleased haue inlightened vnderstanding might haue truely seene lookt former errours might haue benefited selfe another kinde manner time willinger deliuer vnto made discourse selfe doe truly heart albeit worthy merit thereby reward great sinner yet notwithstanding little crumme poore drop small sparke reward instant slender repentance mine resolution though weake doe good good beginning put selfe without paiment soone regained money new persecution new trouble beganne grow vpon mee would god beene considerate ought haue beene stript mee contentment wherein liud hee beganne touch mee quicke beat many stripe small shade iuy like ionas gourd keepe mee scorching sunne lost quite taken mee dryde vp withered worme bred root wasted consumed forced lye open heates suffering new calamity new trouble neuer thought without cause giuen mee least signe offence hauing way deserued hard measure stay thy pen ingeniously confesse misery affliction hidden treasure field highly commended vnto v since thou hast patiently heard hitherto thine owne pleasure heare mee another mine hearken little remainder misfortune wherevnto shall giue end next ensuing chapter chapter ix guzman de alfarache prosecutes hapned vnto gallies meanes came freed thence famous painter excellent art fellow world vpon short story painter application fame report whose admirable piece worke came gentleman house going roome hee drew picture hee agreed paint table faire beautifull horse rich furniture gracefully set forth loose seeme runne away fast legges could carry painter performed piece worke possible perfection shewd therein vtmost skill hauing fully finisht placed colour might soonest grow dry gentleman came see worke vvent forward know farre hee proceeded therein painter made haste shew telling hee already ended hee set forth table drying painter greatly care thing nothing materiall set manner one another horse stood hee placed table foot vpward saddle downeward gentleman hee lookt vpon seeming vnto bee hee bespoken said vnto sir horse wisht make drawne running away rather seemes lye tumbling ground discreet painter mildly made answere seemeth sir haue great insight painting picture pretend worship bee pleased turne table wherevpon part downeward turned vpward done gentleman viewing againe rested well contented therewith well goodnesse workmanship thereby taught know owne errour wee consider handyworkes god oftentimes seeme vnto v like horse lye tumbling wallowing ground shall turne table wrought pensill supreme artizan painted life heauen earth beautifying one sunne moone starres variety colour flower fruites like shall finde piece wee would haue worke done full perfection trouble told little seeme harsh sharp vnto v haue ignorant gentleman true discerning aright fewe vnderstand sends vnto v shews mercy vnto v laid vp shall see true shape colour shall take great pleasure delight amongst slaues galley none like vnto either good vsage knowledge giuing good content master pinne fortune wheele slipt vp came strange kind māner like neuer seene hapned time came gentleman galley bare captaines name also kinne vnto learne experience see seruice rich well clad better behaud ware neck massie chaine gold soldierlike iust another world vsd haue heretofore dieted poope good garnish plate seruants waited vpon well handsomly suited fell next day imbarking eighteene linkes chaine missing lesse worth fifty crownes sure owne seruants must needes haue none came pooperoome knowne person free suspicion yet notwithstanding better cleering doubt captaines seruants put lash yet newes heard could neuer heare get least inckling thereof world knowne till day stole became better excusing hereafter like misfortune captaine came kinseman told best surest course time stayd commit charge apparell iewels trusty galleyslaue might take care keepe neate handsome assuring whatsoeuer hee deliuer one custody durst well hangd giue true account bee much haire missing thing trust withall gentleman liked well counsaile making afterwards inquirie galley might fittest man sufficient man made choyce recommended vnto good satisfaction would giue vnderstanding diligencie attending person cleanlines selfe also thing master gentleman heard good quality likewise able intertaine witty iests merry conceit hee thought time long till hee might see poope haste called mastersmate vnto intreated part could deny request although grieud much good seruice hee receiued mee clapt long chaine legge trailed mee sooner come vnto glad see spake kindely vnto thinke rather feature face action answerable heard somwhat grieue see mee like monky tyd thus chaine drawe mee intreated captaine hee would fauour farre might walke vp downe one fetter graunted meanes inabled doe quicker nimbler seruice well whē sate without meales within cabbin also going fro gally occasion offred inuentorie deliuered vnto apparell iewels whereof still gaue good accompt least affiance iealous owne seruants charge recamera wardrobe whatsoeuer else appertaining vnto might easily excuse themselues thing could steale cleanly cabbind chaplaine neere maine mast gentleman cabbin within poope alittle dispense pantrie kept regalos dainty besides necessary prouision liked well seruice though tooke great deale paine pleasure vnto gaue much content power thing past thorow hand performe many kindness toward slaues friend acquaintance albeit willing haue done like towards soto old camerade yet could get within come fasten kindnes vpon wisht good mine owne spight could discrediting disgracing telling thing truly inuenting othersome like vnto time taken committed prison defaming much lye broaching whatsoeuer hee knew leauing one thing vnript vp manifesting malice shame albeit mine owne part priuy selfe much reformed yet heard thus exclaime would make interpretation stood affected comment vpon themselues listed though god instant haue giuen mee power haue wrought miracle would haue stikt haue said done belzebubs name soto knife sought cut throat point edge thereof still towards yet neuer man heare speake much one foule word euer open mouth make show least choller abusing made reckoning let passe lightly could whole care taken vp diligent atending new master faithfull seruice might procure loue good liking towards hoping might one day fall either recompence good seruice might chance purchase liberty came cabbin stil hand receiue set foot come downe ladder lent hand entering returning cockboate made toothpick table putting vpon plate sate downe meate many maruailous curious hee would often send token friend trencherplates vessel cooling wine cup glass cleanly kept neate euery point pleasure eye behold bottle wine iarrs water fresh sweet wooll mattress whereon lay kept vnknotty soft whole bedding well lookt flea found like troublesom vermin leasure would giue leaue daily exercise goe hunting stopping hole chinkes least suspition breeding master might free flea chinch bad sent haue great diligence pleasing whole manner proceeding vvith master left conuersing seruants would large discourse mee graue weighty matter dealt therein mee distiller vse doe limbecke squeeze hee could mee hee exhausted mee iuice substance turne much hee desired time draw would pause awhile vpon matter speake plainely halfe iealous mee complete perfect bee true touch rellish properly appertaineth purer distillation smacke one herbe euill report soto giuen mee virulent tongue could make mee wrong vertue went fast well speaking ill well action might giue lye also minded thing runne still good resolution proposed selfe waited table would merry tale odde conceited iest anights time hee disposed take nap would chat one thing might keepe still cheerefull merry rather late hee growne somewhat melancholly vpon letter hee receiued dayes graue personage hee much obliged lifetime could neuer drawne himselfe marry wonderfull instant gentleman master hee would get wife perceiuing therefore sadde hee made bold aske reason hee pensiue told likewise aske aduice hee best doe case told thinkes sir fittest answere bee giuen one hath beene auerse marriage himselfe would inforce others therevnto least seeke perswade vnto well content doe hee giue one daughter wife master well pleased counsell gaue resoluing himselfe take course prescribed vnto continuing talke till dinner time willd mee tell beene twice married liked kinde life told sir good peaceable marriage loue condition party stand vpon equall termes glory enioying touching marriage earth heauen state make choise thereof desire saued thereby great perfection exceeding content comfort treat subiect require relation tongue hath tasted true happinesse thereof selfe made matrimony matter money pleasure propagation know say vnto haue deseruedly paid price sinne present punishment indure woman must confesse wisedome discreet worthy wiues carriage haue reduced good order conformitie peruerse wicked men world againe make best tempered holyest men aliue lose patience wicked wiues though able suffer neuer much look vpon iobs wife see desperate humour would faine haue put husband persecute much import haue recourse vnto god onely defend himselfe persecution affliction therefore three friend together conuersation one said opinion marriage happy man hath good hap match good wife happy said buries quickly shee proue vnto ward third said happy hee hath neither tone tother much importunate wife ill condition doth torment vexe man let prouenzall tell quite wearied tyred tale teaching man vid bad wife shrewd wife vnable longer indure harsh behauiour knowing world correct malignant humour might without scandall rid himselfe hee resolued goe make merry wife family house hee countrey farre lying way passe skirt mountaine adioyning close vpon rodanus great swift riuer part vvas narrow past along betweene two mountaines deepe ranne furious currant hee tooke order mule wife ride three dayes one drop water giuen came place aforesaid saw water holding backe hastning downe hanging hill one ridge another shee got riuer whence impossible turne get vp againe steepinesse cliffe able force reyne rushed riuer woman drowned mule much adoe escaped came weake weary scarce able stand vpon legges neuer knew marriage meant yet desire bee informed manner thing may patterne set eye passed thrush summer following hatcht ready fly abroad shift themselues tale certain thrush great shole gathered together thrush world ioynd one muster cloud vpon wing seemed darken ayre interposition betwixt sunne earth make eclipse iolly company assembled met together raisd campe marched away together seeke better place liue yeere owne countrey failed plenty wont afford last entred goodly countrey full garden orchard fresh field many pleasant fruit delicate feeding vvere willing set vp rest seeming vnto bee place onely much recreation delight sufficient sustenance maintenance inhabitant countrey saw flocked together spred net made ginnes pitfals little little went taking destroying poore thrush seeing themselues thus persecuted could safely feed rest quiet sought another place might make better purpose found pleasant plentifull former tasted heere sauce made likewise fly feare danger hung ouer head thus trauell vp downe place place till manner almost destroyd left aliue agreed returne home owne countrey fellowthrushes stayd home saw returne faire fat said vnto happy wretched wee stayd heere behinde see weake poore wee come home good case feather smooth sleeke pleasure looke vpon body plumpe well fed yee scarce fly yee fat whereas pure hunger scarce able stand vpon legges wing ready faintnesse fall ground wherevnto welcomehome trauellers returned answere eye consideration reach farther fatnesse would pleased weigh selues many v went hence v returned home aliue would rather rest contented poore secure fare fatnesse full feeding full danger looke onely pleasure marriage goe farther may see scarce ten ten thousand come cleere escape danger thinke better single life marriage farre better safer alone ill accompanied whilest discourse dinner seruing cloth laid waited wont doe hauing eye still fixed master hand hee might wagge finger might bee readinesse apprehend execute thought whilest thus watchfull master soto sleeping meane worke mischiefe saw former malice could worke mee fauour doe mee harme sheere money hee went purchase reuenge vpon mee grew league friendship vvith master page another bird himselfe bribe corrupted soto malice towards guzman plot disgrace priuate interest drawne thus dishonest towards promised dainty fine payre stockins owne knitting told would bestow vpon waited table could handsomely steale piece plate thence hide secret place pantry might know effect two good thing first gaine good paire stockins bargaine secondly himselfe fellow seruants meanes receiued againe fauour cast page like amisse motion taking occasion day goe downe tooke vp siluer plate lifting vp little boord hid one side gallie cloth taken away going gather vp plate •… manner might make cleane finding one wanting made diligent search searcht euery corner could finde presently gaue notice mist plate end diligence might vsed sooner recouerie vvith seruants appertained poope captaine master beleeue truth first hatred effect produceth enemy soto bare witnesse mee voiced amongst selfe abusing fauour master stolne conuayd away might lay fault vpon others goe away selfe roguish page put helping hand herevnto could disgrace doores beganne set open suspition made little entrance stepping farther degree master often earnest mee confesse truth businesse grow fouler knew mine owne innocencie cleere thereof child new borne could giue satisfaction saue good word traitor page stood vp said thinkes sir vvere amisse would cause dispence pantry searcht possible hee must hide thereabouts gone poope likely might finde lodging course tooke best vvell liked approued getting downe rummaging little roome first place lighted vpon last page put taking forth came vp great ioy proclaimd found hid possible body else doe carried show truth caught negatiue confirmed suspition crime laid charge captaine commanded alguazils seruant glue fifty stripe master free intreating pardon first fault committed aduising withall hereafter taken like soundly punisht pay old new held vp head heart neuer truely merry inioy selfe past fearing come thinking selfe done wrong would hauing scapt well watch time doe greater mischiefe iealous farther foule play earnestly besought captaine master would quit charge might haue good deliuer ouer thing custodie take fauour would returne mee backe againe laden iron banke thought ground desire goe backe againe serue old master mastersmate howbeit importune hard instant reason earnest vrgent vpon mee though grieud serue attend dayes life miserable man said know vvorld vvhat doe defend selfe traytors seemeth haue set themselues onely purpose vndoo could possibly doe life man liuing could carefull watching like argo hundred eye whatsoeuer committed argo eye sufficient keepe man malice enemy charge neglecting thing scarce worth looking trifle bee reckoned yet care would serue turne hath done mee see good vvas rising heauen hath thought fit must first fall one euening master comming forth went wont doe receiue ascend stayres gaue hand come vp tooke cloake sword hat gaue seagowne cap greene damaske thing still readinesse done carried downe thing putting right place night knowing meanes vnlesse diuels could conceiue otherwise hat falne downe place hung found without band set gold button whip sir iohn gone trice morning saw lay hatband gone stood like man amazd well searcht diligently life layne vpon purpose world hatband would appeare signe marke thereof gone told master ah said know thee thiefe wot well thou art thou doest set heart rest shall serue turne hatband must lost shall make fetch yet faile purpose besides know fetch well inough doest thou thinke euer since plate missing haue lookt water found disease thou art sicke thou goest seeking new occasion thou mayst quit seruice thou shalt serue still spite thy teeth vexe thee thou shalt haue thousand bastonados walke daily thy shoulder shalt thou euer serue master galley selfe case go hence farre befriend thou shalt rankt like rogue according thy villanies deserue thy lewd naughty dealing since good vsage towards thee make thee leaue thou art euer wilt guzman de alfarache thats inough need say vnto thee know say vnto thee indeare griefe conceiued herevpon finding selfe cleere innocent yet charged iust would haue lawfull crime replyde much one word power speake haue sought iustifie selfe beene gospel haue deliuered vnto comming mouth credit would haue beene giuen vnto mahomet therefore silent held peace word profit man better tongue dumbe heart tell griefes vnto god inwardly selfe gaue maiestie thankes affliction beseeching would free mee man hand knew wherein offended truely become another man quite altred would rather suffer selfe torne thousand piece commit least crime world vsed many diligence saw meanes could bring hatband light captaine commanded alguazils man hee beat mee neuer giue mee ouer till confest theft presently taken vp could indured well could would haue mee acknowledge neuer knew whilest soule powrd forth prayer knew inuocating heauen torment bloud cruell stripe draw mee might bee ioyned innocent droppes vndeserued torture good god suffered shed might bee auailable mee saluation seeing way one dye must vnder tyrannous hand leaue sooner saw vvhat pittifull case nothing else wanting betwixt mee death breathing forth spirit albeit seemed master crueltie suffering selfe thus whipt greater commanding done yet last taking compassion vpon pittying great torment put caused taken away chase body salt wine vineger vvas greater torment vnto captaine would haue haue giuen much vpon belly saying little doe know sir condition theeues like nature fox counterfet themselues almost dead lye life let alone suffer take breath runne like many yong colt hardy piece sixe penny let flea skin backes let dogge assure himselfe hee shall carry away neuer giue ouer till haue either hatband life commanded carried away thence dispensilla little pantry lye mee know often perswasions admonition euer anon notifying vnto mee either deliuer vp hatband arme selfe patience resolued must beaten death rather inioy stolne man restore hee neuer could cumply commanded knew gallyslaue loue made show beare vnto mee good lookes gaue mee proceeded onely pleasure tooke merry iests witty conceit mine owne sake greatest griefe feele misery much paine indure false witnesse giuen mee verily beleeue iustly deserue punishment therefore tooke pitie dayes rubbing washt salt vineger past ouer head lo came afresh vpon commanding make restitution hatband would speake truely could giue pulld mee pantry weake ill fastening cord wrests mine arme haling vp pully hung know long ayre terrible torment vnto mee thought haue breathd last heart afflicted scarce feeling thing body breath began faile last let downe giue case lay downe vpon backe athwart cannon lye betweene forecastle hinder decke belly lay fit purpose laid thereon cruell blowes beene heinous crime charging officer belabour euen death captaine beginning feare ready giue vp ghost hee bee accountable king mee cruell vsage perish punishment hee held better option two rather lose hatband wherevpon hee commanded take away carry wonted lodging cured began recouer got little strength yet thought themselues sufficiently reuenged still stedfast beliefe •… notable villainem stubborn rogue would rather suffer rigour whipping scourging lose interest supposed theft insomuch commanded master mate neuer pardon offend carefull punish still sinnes veniall beene mortall could otherwise choose fulfill captaines command durst life doe otherwise chastise vnaccustomed crueltie one get mee sleepe due houres anotherwhile wake time supply want sell allowance sparing meat belly relieue necessity sure lasht vsing extremely ill weary life desire heart wretched world might haue better colour doe might picke occasion pay mee soundly yet saue themselues harmelesse committed charge trouble italian haue signifie tu •… la robo del rey french •… nders con •… ille cor •… lla protestation thing therein wanting sure pay well likewise vpon occasion like rest gallyslaues put tugge oare banke hindermost therefore painfull subiect inclemency weather summer heates winter cold still tyde haue care keepe vp beake gally windes mouth goe snugge tyte custody committed iron implement vvere aboord likewise cable cast weigh anchor need require sayle winde faine looke foresayle also sheate larboord sayle sayle something still doe either behinde spinne hempe whereof smaller cordage lesser rope made spent imployed gallies put account tye vp yard ruffle sayles dry deliuer shipboyes hoyse foresayle see euery thing fit mend end sayles torne rent winde patch lengthen grown short strengthen old tacklings odde end store purpose cable supplyde still new stuffe helpe gunner plant ordnance remoue carriage winde turne artillerie would haue care laid vpon stop touchholes see well couerd wet come looke scouring stick spoones powre powder rammer spunges linstock belonged artillerie vvhen mastermates man way otherwise occupied vvas inioyned sweepe make cleane gally bee common swabber causing shipboyes bring mat rush make map wherewithall rub keeping alwayes neat cleane kinde filthinesse old end ragges flax tow make wad wisp go longhouse know meane vtmost misery went stomake others meanest basest office serue beastly may giue worse word feare turning thy stomake piece businesse must first forced kisse giue hand attourney must kisse know haue many thing committed charge accustomed vnto must haue almost impossible haue failed performance great care alwayes tooke study doe thing well seldome neuer misse dutie vse grew euery day lesse difficult euen hence also would fortune haue throwne mee downe could force cannot extend selfe good minde aduersitie make men wise prudent still bare vp stoutly continued firme constant withstanding power could make hee rich liues happily euermore afraid falling contrarie good hope rising impossible fall lower minde gaue fell soto camerade came gallies either giue almes preach faith christ infidel sin brought thither greatest notorious thiefe euer vvas heard time either italy spaine hee sometimes beene souldier knew euery part countrey one trauelld fro many time hee perceiuing gallies sayle along mediterranean went touching vpon coast barbary seeking reprizals entred imagination treat moore gallyslaues faction make purchase gally goe sheere away purpose already prouided weapon hid bycorners vnder bank make vse time serue could bring designe passe without hauing bee party regard place banke vvhere behinde backe ordering tacklings cable committed wholly charge thought fit make acquainted intention casting considering himselfe businesse would better welcome man selfe well condemned serue slaue dayes life also might free selfe hell whereinto thrust seuerely punish soto would haue broken ice himselfe much desire conferre mee hee could finde meanes wherevpon sent messenger vnto mee one hee might trust desiring reconciliation fauour would ioyne better effecting freedome cruell bondage slauery wherein liued returned answere businesse easily vndertaken hee supposed ought bee well weighd thought vpon resolue thereon must need runne great hazzard vndergoing thereof medium betwixt two either come cleere lose liues moore brought message counsell seeme amisse telling would goe answere soto finde time come againe vnto talke farther interim message past fro consulted selfe put full resolution doe thing infamous ill profit benefit accrue thereby vnto knew time mee aduise farther vvith well saw resolued also feare fall otherwise misse purpose might chance disclose suborne false witness better excuse saue themselues giuing free selfe misery wherein liud incited therevnto well gaue good word made selfe party beeing resolued put plot execution vpon saint iohn raeptists day betimes morning eue come one souldiers going vntrusse point came ockame wipe posterior rose vp whispering care secretly said vnto sir tell captain import life honour heare two word tend maiesties seruice therefore let presently giue order may bee brought poope captaine forthwith commanded come presence reuealed vnto conspiracy whereat blest himselfe would scarce giue credit vnto seeming vnto inuented mine head might eased troublesome labour great misery indured meanes might procure mercede fauour told find weapon brought thither hee rendred many thankes vnto god hee deliuered great danger promising would see well rewarded labour hee commanded one captaine squadron hee make diligent search bankes pointed forth vnto looking weapon last lighted vpon presently therevpon processe fulminated forth offendours next day following great festiuall day solemnely obserued v punishment deferrd till next day followinggod good fortune well pleased seruice guide business mine owne diuine hand would need haue fall luckily mee opening chest hang streamer belonged mainemast misne fitting place well acknowledgement thankefulnesse vnto god honour solemnitie day found therein nest rat amongst trinket master hatband soto conceiuing world like goe desirous haue ghostly father come like good christian might make confession sinnes crauing pardon forgiuenesse hand false witness suborned hatband together declare wherefore hee done howbeit made show reconciled vnto enter new league friendship yet purpose resolution made themselues master gally haue stabd hatred towards mee nothing could satisfie death whose reuengefull hand good god day gracious vnto free implacable malice soto one companion ringleader rebellion condemned drawne piece foure gallies fiue bee hangd sentence executed many found haue finger businesse confined gallies terme life first publikely whipt passing gally gally till rounded whole fleete moore nose eares cut marke might knowne euer came rogue vpon record exemplary iustice hauing past vpon offender vvas ended thing settled captaine sends mee highly extolling goodnesse nature innocencie loyaltie crauing pardon former ill vsage hee commanded iron bee strooke gaue leaue goe libertie vp downe gally till maiesties royall scedula sent absolute discharge captaine supplicated consulted councell warre petition signed sooner sent downe set liberty heere gentle reader doe put full point misfortune haue giuen thee large account lewd life truely summd vp vnto thee hereafter thou shalt see third last part god shall giue life doe first exchange transitorie one one eternall hope life faithfull finis
